author: Marissa Meyer

quote: A few seconds after he stepped out into the hallway and closed the door behind him, there was a fleshly smack and then Andrew yelling, Ouch. What in the hell was that for? Your timing sucks on an epic level, Daemon shot back.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: Imagination was given to man to compensate him for what he is not; a sense of humor to console him for what he is.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: Find something useful to do with your morning,' she thought to him as she neared her chambers. 'Do something heroic in front of an audience. Knock a child into a river while no one's looking and then rescue him.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals, I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: I didn't realize there was a ranking. I said. Sadie frowned. What do you mean? A ranking, I said. You know, what's crazier than what. Oh, sure there is, Sadie said. She sat back in her chair. First you have your generic depressives. They're a dime a dozen and usually pretty boring. Then you've got the bulimics and the anorexics. They're slightly more interesting, although usually they're just girls with nothing better to do. Then you start getting into the good stuff: the arsonists, the schizophrenics, the manic-depressives. You can never quite tell what those will do. And then you've got the junkies. They're completely tragic, because chances are they're just going to go right back on the stuff when they're out of here. So junkies are at the top of the crazy chain, I said. Sadie shook her head. Uh-uh, she said. Suicides are. I looked at her. Why? Anyone can be crazy, she answered. That's usually just because there's something screwed up in your wiring, you know? But suicide is a whole different thing. I mean, how much do you have to hate yourself to want to just wipe yourself out?
author: Michael Thomas Ford

quote: Sissy Mae Smith...stumbled into the room loaded down with even more bags. You pack like a woman, she snarled when she finally dropped the luggage to the floor. How can one man have so much conditioner?
author: Shelly Laurenston

quote: A library is like an island in the middle of a vast sea of ignorance, particularly if the library is very tall and the surrounding area has been flooded.
author: Daniel Handler

quote: Everyone has a sense of humor. If you don't laugh at jokes, you probably laugh at opinions.
author: Criss Jami

quote: When everything is coming your way, you're in the wrong lane.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Blood is really warm,
author: Ryan Mecum

quote: Bones has always been smart, I muttered. His intelligence was just camouflaged under a mountain of p**sy.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Any customer can have a car painted any colour that he wants so long as it is black.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Regardless of what I think about Islam or Wicca or any other religion, the fact is that it's a group of people. Every faith has its ceremonies. And since it's made up of people, every faith also has its assholes.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: He looks like a runway model. How in the world am I going to be able to reject that? The world is so unfair. Seriously, it's like turning Brad Pitt down for a date. The girl who could actually do it should win an award for idiot of the century.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: Unless you stop him. Perhaps next we meet.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: Katsa and Po were trying to drown each other and, judging from their hoots of laughter, enjoying it immensely.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: My love is meatloaf flavored. I just wish my meatloaf was also meatloaf flavored.
author: Dora J. Arod

quote: Maybe you could be mine / or maybe well be entwined / aimless in this sexless foreplay.
author: Jess C Scott

quote: The best way to keep children at home is to make the home atmosphere pleasant, and let the air out of the tires.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: There is nothing particularly wrong with salmon, of course, but like caramel candy, strawberry yogurt, or liquid carpet cleaner, if you eat too much of it you are not going to enjoy your meal.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Sensitive, I tried.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: Every instinct that is found in any man is in all men. The strength of the emotion may not be so overpowering, the barriers against possession not so insurmountable, the urge to accomplish the desire less keen. With some, inhibitions and urges may be neutralized by other tendencies. But with every being the primal emotions are there. All men have an emotion to kill; when they strongly dislike some one they involuntarily wish he was dead. I have never killed any one, but I have read some obituary notices with great satisfaction.
author: Clarence Darrow

quote: Democracy is a pathetic belief in the collective wisdom of individual ignorance. No one in this world, so far as I knowand I have researched the records for years, and employed agents to help mehas ever lost money by underestimating the intelligence of the great masses of the plain people. Nor has anyone ever lost public office thereby.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Hobbes: Jump! Jump! Jump! I win!
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Eric moved the broom experimentally and made an attempt to sweep the glass into the pan while it lay in the middle of the floor. Of course, the pan slid away. Eric scowled.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: You! You tricked me! I never want to see you or that bottle of liquid arsenic again!
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Marsh: Our best efforts were never even a mild annoyance to the Lord Ruler.
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: A true friend is a gift from God. Since God doesn't exist, guess what? Neither do true friends.
author: Scott Dikkers

quote: I'm very polite by nature, even the voices in my head let each other finish their sentences.
author: Graham Parke

quote: I am not really breaking any rules. Charlie said I could never take another step through the door again... I came in through the window... Still, the intent was clear, said Edward.
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: Build a man a fire, and he'll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire, and he'll be warm for the rest of his life.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Everything is funny as long as it is happening to somebody else.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Writing is like getting married. One should never commit oneself until one is amazed at one's luck.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: There is a fine line between fishing and just standing on the shore like an idiot.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Mike nodded. A sombre nod. The nod Napoleon might have given if somebody had met him in 1812 and said, So, you're back from Moscow, eh?
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: When red-headed people are above a certain social grade their hair is auburn.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Charlotte, darling, Henry said to his wife, who was staring at im in gape-mouthed horror. Jassamine, beside her, was wided eyed. Sorry im late. You know, i think i might nearly have the sensor working-
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Man is certainly stark mad; he cannot make a worm, and yet he will be making gods by dozens.
author: Montaigne

quote: I have noticed that the people who are late are often so much jollier than the people who have to wait for them.
author: E. V. Lucas

quote: Da. This is going very well already.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Felix believed that the answer to every problem involved penguins; but it wasn't fair to birds, and I was getting tired of teleporting them back home. Somewhere in Antarctica, a whole flock of Magellanic penguins were undergoing psychotherapy.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: My first words, as I was being born [...] I looked up at my mother and said, 'that's the last time I'm going up one of those.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Noseless and Handless, the Lannister Boys.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: It is harder to crack prejudice than an atom.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Go ahead. You're not going to walk in on anyone. I'm home alone.
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quote: Whats your name?' she asked, and surprised herself. But for some reason, she wanted to know.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: If I could bronze my love, itd be worthy of a silver medal.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: In matters of grave importance, style, not sincerity, is the vital thing.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Boys are like purses. You're always gonna have that one boy that you're always comfortable with and you know you'll always kind of like. That's your purse that you wear everywhere. Then you have that gorgeous bag that you want everyone to see you with but the gorgeous bag is usually an asshole or costs a lot of money. Then you have those other purses that you really like but you really don't want to be seen with
author: Lauren Conrad

quote: I don't know why people are afraid of lust. Then I can imagine that they are very afraid of me, for I have a great lust for everything. A lust for life, a lust for how the summer-heated street feels beneath my feet, a lust for the touch of another's skin on my skin...a lust for everything. I even lust after cake. Yes, I am very lusty and very scary.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: You're a monster.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: Everybody's got to believe in something. I believe I'll have another beer.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: But, of course, you might be asking yourself, 'Am I a feminist? I might not be. I don't know! I still don't know what it is! I'm too knackered and confused to work it out. That curtain pole really still isn't up! I don't have time to work out if I am a women's libber! There seems to be a lot to it. WHAT DOES IT MEAN?'
author: Caitlin Moran

quote: Tomorrow is promised to no one.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: Be kind to dragons, for thou art crunchy when toasted and taste good with ketchup. (Sebastian)
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: My shining dishonesty will be the salvation of me.
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: It isn't what you have, or who you are, or where you are, or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy. It is what you think about.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Sometimes I think it is a great mistake to have matter that can think and feel. It complains so. By the same token, though, I suppose that boulders and mountains and moons could be accused of being a little too phlegmatic.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quote: You can swim, too. he says. Where did you learn that in District Twelve?
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: Men
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: I made this [letter] very long, because I did not have the leisure to make it shorter.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: No brain at all, some of them [people], only grey fluff that's blown into their heads by mistake, and they don't Think.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Stuffed deer heads on walls are bad enough, but its worse when you see them wearing dark glasses, having streamers around their necks and a hat on their antlers. Because then you know they were enjoying themselves at a party when they were shot.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: It is one of the defects of my character that I cannot altogether dislike anyone who makes me laugh.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: He was painfully shy, which, as is often the manner of the painfully shy, he overcompensated for by being too loud at the wrong times.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: It's a lazy Saturday afternoon, there's a couple lying naked in bed reading Encyclopediea Brittannica to each other, and arguing about whether the Andromeda Galaxy is more 'numinous' than the Ressurection. Do they know how to have a good time, or don't they?
author: Carl Sagan

quote: If a person with multiple personalities threatens suicide, is that considered a hostage situation?
author: Steven Wright

quote: I once loved a girl who almost loved me, but not as much as she loved John Cusack.
author: Chuck Klosterman

quote: Who knew that the devil had a factory where he made millions of fossils, which his minions distributed throughout the earth, in order to confuse my tiny brain?
author: Lewis Black

quote: So. [Isobel] cleared her throat. What are we doing?
author: Kelly Creagh

quote: Ooh..I want one - Bex
author: Ally Carter

quote: Which of us is happy in this world? Which of us has his desire? or, having it, is satisfied?
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I was supposed to write a romantic comedy, but my characters broke up.
author: Ann Brashares

quote: NO PDA,school rules. And besides she's my partner dickhead. said Alex.
author: Simone Elkeles

quote: What's going on? Newt asked, looking back and forth between Thomas and Aris. Why're you guys looking at each other like you just fell in love?
author: James Dashner

quote: I had a dream about you. You were an escalator, and I was a flight of stairs. You thought I was a Luddite, and I thought I was as ostrich, because I hadnt figured out how to put the fly in flight. One day you broke down, and then you saw that you and I werent so different after all.
author: Dora J. Arod

quote: I had a dream about you. We installed Dr. Robert Jarviks artificial heart in a mannequin and brought it to life, only to later kill it because a creature thats all fake heart and no brain is whats commonly called a politician, and must be destroyed.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: Kat laughed. 'Who wants to live forever?'
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: Arthur blinked at the screens and felt he was missing something important. Suddenly he realized what it was.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Down in the water, Octavian yelled, Get me out of here! Ill kill you!
author: Rick Riordan

quote: I suppose its not a social norm, and not a manly thing to do  to feel, discuss feelings. So thats what Im giving the finger to. Social norms and stuffwhat good are social norms, really? I think all they do is project a limited and harmful image of people. It thus impedes a broader social acceptance of what someone, or a group of people, might actually be like.
author: Jess C Scott

quote: Kenji snorts.Thats because youre not fragile, Kenji says. If anything, everyone needs to protect themselves from you. Youre like a freaking beast, he says. Then adds, I mean, you knowlike, a cute beast. A little beast that tears shit up and breaks the earth and sucks the life out of people.
author: Tahereh Mafi

quote: Peter, you're twelve years old. I'm ten. They have a word for people our age. They call us children and they treat us like mice.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: But Piglet is so small that he slips into a pocket, where it is very comfortable to feel him when you are not quite sure whether twice seven is twelve or twenty-two.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: We're actors  we're the opposite of people!
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: Basically, everyone thinks--knows--how sweet I am.
author: Anna Banks

quote: Unseen in the background, Fate was quietly slipping lead into the boxing-glove.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Me and Katy look adorkable in extraterrestrial
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: You show me a lazy prick who's lying in bed all day, watching TV, only occasionally getting up to piss, and I'll show you a guy who's not causing any trouble.
author: George Carlin

quote: Yes! I'm
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: I am not sure I trust you.
author: Megan Whalen Turner

quote: James - Are you paying attention or just trying to make me look like an idoit?
author: Julia Quinn

quote: Either get out of bed or else take your clothes off, he said. I'm not in the mood to compromise.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: All the time you're saying to yourself, 'I could do that, but I won't,'  which is just another way of saying that you can't.
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: Housework can kill you if done right.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Usually my form of turning someone down was shoving a stake through his heart while smirking, Gotcha!
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: I never gossip. I observe. And then relay my observations to practically everyone.
author: Gail Carriger

quote: Im forever near a stereo saying, What the fuck is this garbage? And the answer is always the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
author: Nick Cave

quote: If you're going to make a science fiction movie, then have a hover craft chase, for God's sake.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Kids. You gotta love them. I adore children. A little salt, a squeeze of lemon--perfect.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Don't mess with a wizard when he's wizarding!
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Whitney Houstons cover of I Will Always Love You was constantly on my FM Walkman radio around that time. I think that made me cry because I associated it with absolutely no one.
author: Tina Fey

quote: You rush a miracle worker, you get lousy miracles!
author: Jim Butcher

quote: I'm a big believer in putting things off, In fact, I even put off procrastinating.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: No adolescent ever wants to be understood, which is why they complain about being misunderstood all the time.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Sometimes I think I must have a Guardian Idiot. A little invisible spirit just behind my shoulder, looking out for me...only he's an imbecile.
author: Spider Robinson

quote: I love being a writer. What I can't stand is the paperwork.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: It's a shame that the only thing a man can do for eight hours a day is work. He can't eat for eight hours; he can't drink for eight hours; he can't make love for eight hours. The only thing a man can do for eight hours is work.
author: William Faulkner

quote: The miracle isn't that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
author: John Bingham

quote: She would've been a good woman, said The Misfit, if it had been somebody there to shoot her every minute of her life.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: I sent a quick text to Adrian:
author: Richelle Mead

quote: Room service? Send up a larger room.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Whats not so great is that all this technology is destroying our social skills. Not only have we given up on writing letters to each other, we barely even talk to each other. People have become so accustomed to texting that theyre actually startled when the phone rings. Its like we suddenly all have Batphones. If it rings, there must be danger.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: good girls go to heaven and bad girls go everywhere
author: Helen Gurley Brown

quote: There is a great need for a sarcasm font.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: So you were going to rescue the Prince! Why did you pretend to run away? To deceive the Witch?
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: Conscience is the inner voice that warns us somebody may be looking.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: High School. Societys bright idea to put all their aggressive, naive youth into one environment to torment and emotionally scar each other for life.
author: Chris Colfer

quote: This is a good place, he said.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Would you like a cough drop Dolores?
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Thus, though I dislike to differ with such a great man,
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: I like to write when I feel spiteful. It is like having a good sneeze.
author: D.H. Lawrence

quote: To alcohol! The cause of... and solution to... all of life's problems
author: Matt Groening

quote: Gabi to Marcus I can't believe out of one hundred thousand sperm, you were the fastest!
author: Cherise Sinclair

quote: I like ducks. Jem observed diplomatically. Esspecially the ones in Hyde Park. He glanced side ways at Will; both boys were sitting at the edge of a high table, thier legs dangling over the side. Remember when you tried to convince me to feed pultry pie the the mallards in the park to see if you couls breed a race of cannibal ducks?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Why do all your brilliant ideas involve felonies?
author: Kathy Reichs

quote: We must respect the other fellow's religion, but only in the sense and to the extent that we respect his theory that his wife is beautiful and his children smart.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: I like to see the glass as half full, hopefully of jack daniels.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Monkeys can't talk, stupid!
author: Jeff Kinney

quote: If you fail to report within the next 12 hours. you will be terminated. If you attack any humans, you will be terminated. If you attempt to remove the tracking device, you will be terminated. We look forward to working with you.
author: Kiersten White

quote: What...what about when I'm married?
author: Stephanie Perkins

quote: To find out if she really loved me, I hooked her up to a lie detector. And just as I suspected, my machine was broken.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: Do you like to slide? His voice was eager.
author: Gail Carson Levine

quote: When you say gorgeous, Jen started, are we talking Brad Pitt boyish good looks, or Johnny Depp make ya want to slap somebody? No, were talking Brad and Johnny need to bow down and
author: Quinn Loftis

quote: Have you made any other friends since we've been here?
author: Michelle Hodkin

quote: The trouble is you can shut your eyes but you cant shut your mind.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: You know that look that women get when they want to have sex? Me neither.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Tragedy is when I cut my finger. Comedy is when you fall into an open sewer and die.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: Life doesn't make any sense, and we all pretend it does. Comedy's job is to point out that it doesn't make sense, and that it doesn't make much difference anyway.
author: Eric Idle

quote: Scientists talk about dark matter, the invisible, mysterious substance that occupies the space between stars. Dark matter makes up 99.99 percent of the universe, and they don't know what it is. Well I do. It's apathy. That's the truth of it; pile together everything we know and care about in the universe and it will still be nothing more than a tiny speck in the middle of a vast black ocean of Who Gives a Fuck.
author: David Wong

quote: It is one of those lessons that every child should learn: Don't play with fire, sharp objects, or ancient artifacts.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: Be sure to lie to your kids about the benevolent, all-seeing Santa Claus. It will prepare them for an adulthood of believing in God.
author: Scott Dikkers

quote: Why did he have to be so gorgeous? Why did he have to stand so close, and why did I still love him so much?
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Are you an idiot, or an idiot?' Gargarin hissed.
author: Melina Marchetta

quote: It is by the goodness of god that in our country we have those 3 unspeakably precious things: freedom of speech, freedom of conscience, and the prudence never to practice either of them.
author: Mark Twain

quote: An empty stomach is not a good political adviser.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I really believe, or want to believe, really I am nuts, otherwise I'll never be sane.
author: Allen Ginsberg

quote: She'd absolutely adored the library_an entire building where anyone could take things they didn't own and feel no remorse about it.
author: Ally Carter

quote: You can't give her that!' she screamed. 'It's not safe!'
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Can you define plan as a loose sequence of manifestly inadequate observations and conjectures, held together by panic, indecision, and ignorance? If so, it was a very good plan.
author: Jonathan Stroud

quote: My mother told me that life isn't always about pleasing yourself and that sometimes you have to do things for the sole benefit of another human being. I completely agreed with her, but reminded her that that was what blow jobs were for.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: I went to a restaurant that serves breakfast at any time so I ordered French toast during the Renaissance.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Kitten, this is my best mate, Charles, but you can call him Spade. Charles, this is Cat, the woman Ive been telling you about. You can see for yourself that everything Ive said isan understatement.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: I glanced up to see Liz and smiled. Thank you.
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: How long have you been with Raphael?
author: Nalini Singh

quote: I've heard that hard work never killed anyone, but I say why take the chance?
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Because I trust in the ever-changing climate of the heart. (At least, today I feel that way.) I think it is necessary to have many experiences for the sake of feeling something; for the sake of being challenged, and for the sake of being expressive, to offer something to someone else, to learn what we are capable of.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: I had the right to remain silent... but I didn't have the ability.
author: Ron White

quote: Aside from velcro, time is the most mysterious substance in the universe. You can't see it or touch it, yet a plumber can charge you upwards of seventy-five dollars per hour for it, without necessarily fixing anything.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Elizabeth: Your balls, Mr. Darcy?
author: Seth Grahame-Smith

quote: What do you think that fish is?' Sam asked Astrid.
author: Michael  Grant

quote: I'm the most important person in the lives of almost everyone I know and a good number of the people I've never even met.
author: David Sedaris

quote: We'd spent maybe ten minutes together, during which time I'd accidentally swung a sword at her, she'd saved my life, and I'd run away chased by a band of supernatural killing machines. You know, your typical chance meeting.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Tyson- Cash? Like...green paper?
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Bitten? You mean you're a-
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: We lay there and looked up at the night sky and she told me about stars called blue squares and red swirls and I told her I'd never heard of them. Of course not, she said, the really important stuff they never tell you. You have to imagine it on your own.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Do you love him?
author: Richelle Mead

quote: So it's true what they say about warlocks, then?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: The great Gaels of Ireland are the men that God made mad,
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: To love is easy, to be in a relationship is extremely difficult.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: The reason for the unreason with which you treat my reason , so weakens my reason that with reason I complain of your beauty.
author: Cervantes Saavedra

quote: I hate reality but it's still the best place to get a good steak.
author: Woody Allen

quote: I had just heard tales that the Valkyrie were large warriors, akin to Amazons.
author: Kresley Cole

quote: I stood and walked around the desk so I could stand over him. Menacingly. Like Darth Vader, only with better lung capacity.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Succotash my cocker spaniel, you fudging crevasse-hole dipshiitake!
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: What is your advice to young writers?
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: Everything here is edible; even I'm edible. But that, dear children, is cannibalism, and is in fact frowned upon in most societies.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: I tried to tell you. You said you didn't care, remember?
author: Gena Showalter

quote: It is happy for you that you possess the talent of flattering with delicacy. May I ask whether these pleasing attentions proceed from the impulse of the moment, or are they the result of previous study?
author: Jane Austen

quote: Morning is an important time of day, because how you spend your morning can often tell you what kind of day you are going to have. For instance, if you wake up to the sound of twittering birds, and find yourself in an enormous canopy bed, with a butler standing next to you holding a breakfast of freshly made muffins and hand-squeezed orange juice on a silver tray, you will know that your day will be a splendid one. If you wake up to the sound of church bells, and find yourself in a fairly big regular bed, with a butler standing next to you holding a breakfast of hot tea and toast on a plate, you will know that your day will be O.K. And if you wake up to the sound of somebody banging two metal pots together, and find yourself in a small bunk bed, with a nasty foreman standing in the doorway holding no breakfast at all, you will know that your day will be horrid.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Along with the standard computer warranty agreement which said that if the machine 1) didn't work, 2) didn't do what the expensive advertisements said, 3) electrocuted the immediate neighborhood, 4) and in fact failed entirely to be inside the expensive box when you opened it, this was expressly, absolutely, implicitly and in no event the fault or responsibility of the manufacturer, that the purchaser should consider himself lucky to be allowed to give his money to the manufacturer, and that any attempt to treat what had just been paid for as the purchaser's own property would result in the attentions of serious men with menacing briefcases and very thin watches. Crowley had been extremely impressed with the warranties offered by the computer industry, and had in fact sent a bundle Below to the department that drew up the Immortal Soul agreements, with a yellow memo form attached just saying: 'Learn, guys...
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: I'm too young, too smart and too good-looking to die.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: When God made man she was practicing.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: I'd kill for a Nobel Peace Prize.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Go on, get out! Last words are for fools who haven't said enough!
author: Karl Marx

quote: I'm making a list
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: Either you go to America with Mrs. Van Hopper or you come home to Manderley with me.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: Speak softly and employ a huge man with a crowbar.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Let me ask you a question Alex. What do you think is the greatest evil on this plant today?
author: Anthony Horowitz

quote: ...cursing my heels and debating whether it was faster to stop and take them off--damn ankle straps!--or keep running with the potential neck breakers. Wouldnt that make a charming epitaph? Here lies Cat. Killed not by fang, but Ferragamos.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: You like them, I realized.
author: Michelle Hodkin

quote: He who laughs last laughs the laughiest.
author: Louise Rennison

quote: Everything not forbidden is compulsory
author: T.H. White

quote: I really should come with a warning label.
author: Tom Upton

quote: You want him to walk? Caleb demands. Are you insane?
author: Veronica Roth

quote: The impossible often has a kind of integrity to it which the merely improbable lacks.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Do you answer a question directly?
author: leigh bardugo

quote: Do you love me, Westley? Is that it?
author: William Goldman

quote: I was supposed to be waiting up here when you got back, only your Phoenix lot got in the way...
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: What's another word for thesaurus?
author: Steven Wright

quote: Captain! To your left theres a Lunar guard and on your right is a doctor whos running tests on Lunars and Im being held by one of Levanas wolf hybrids and please be careful!
author: Marissa Meyer

quote: An artist is somebody who produces things that people don't need to have.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Simple. I got very bored and depressed, so I went and plugged myself in to its external computer feed. I talked to the computer at great length and explained my view of the Universe to it, said Marvin.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: I am not always good and noble. I am the hero of this story, but I have my off moments.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: When he finished, he drank from the cup. Everyone else did too, so I followed suit.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: We learn from experience that men never learn anything from experience.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: When your children are teenagers, it's important to have a dog so that someone in the house is happy to see you.
author: Nora Ephron

quote: Can you enter a house uninvited?
author: Abigail Gibbs

quote: Check out that one at the end. He's taken the form of a footstool. Weird...but somehow I like his style.
author: Jonathan Stroud

quote: I notice that you use plain, simple language, short words and brief sentences. That is the way to write Englishit is the modern way and the best way. Stick to it; don't let fluff and flowers and verbosity creep in. When you catch an adjective, kill it. No, I don't mean utterly, but kill most of themthen the rest will be valuable. They weaken when they are close together. They give strength when they are wide apart. An adjective habit, or a wordy, diffuse, flowery habit, once fastened upon a person, is as hard to get rid of as any other vice.
author: Mark Twain

quote: How do you feel right now?
author: Richelle Mead

quote: A photographer is like a cod, which produces a million eggs in order that one may reach maturity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Once, when a religionist denounced me in unmeasured terms, I sent him a card saying, I am sure you believe that I will go to hell when I die, and that once there I will suffer all the pains and tortures the sadistic ingenuity of your deity can devise and that this torture will continue forever. Isn't that enough for you? Do you have to call me bad names in addition?
author: Isaac Asimov

quote: Yes. Reyn is our resident horse master. He has an excellent seat.
author: Cate Tiernan

quote: ...I doubt very seriously whether anyone will hire me.'
author: John Kennedy Toole

quote: I'll not listen to reason... reason always means what someone else has got to say.
author: Elizabeth Gaskell

quote: What's with what you're wearing? Griggs asks while we stand outside waiting for the others.
author: Melina Marchetta

quote: I can still kick your pony-lovin' butt with twice this much pain.
author: James Dashner

quote: If you love something, let it go.
author: B.J. Novak

quote: You might not believe this, but there is
author: Richelle Mead

quote: Oh... Adrian, I've got one more favor to ask you. A big one.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: Oh for craps sake. You're not dying again, are you? It's seriously inconvenient when you do that. -Aphrodite
author: P.C. Cast

quote: You look disappointed to see me, Zach, Macey teased. Don't you like my jacket?
author: Ally Carter

quote: Dont ruin my balls! She laughs as the words leave her mouth.
author: Simone Elkeles

quote: As I got closer to the fence, I held my shirt over my nose to block the smell. One stallion waded through the muck and whinnied angrily at me. He bared his teeth, which were pointed like a bear's.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: The meeting was like a war council with donuts. Then again, back at Camp Half-Blood they used to have their most serious discussions around the Ping-Pong table in the rec room with crackers and Cheez Whiz, so Percy felt right at home.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: And you're blind?
author: James Patterson

quote: Don't you think 'Mark is kind of a weird name for a Shadowhunter? Julian was saying as Emma approached. I mean, if you really think about it. It's confusing. 'Put a Mark on me, Mark.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: It is worth repeating at this point the theories that Ford had come up with, on his first encounter with human beings, to account for their peculiar habit of continually stating and restating the very very obvious, as in It's a nice day, or You're very tall, or So this is it, we're going to die.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: I know the answer! The answer lies within the heart of all mankind! The answer is twelve? I think I'm in the wrong building.
author: Charles Schultz

quote: A father has to be a provider, a teacher, a role model, but most importantly, a distant authority figure who can never be pleased. Otherwise, how will children ever understand the concept of God?
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: Glaring at the doctor, Kev spoke in Romany.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: You're not right in the head, and nor am I, and this is why....this is why I like you.
author: Morrissey

quote: An alcoholic is someone you don't like, who drinks as much as you do.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: Before you criticize a man, walk a mile in his shoes. That way, when you do criticize him, you'll be a mile away and have his shoes.
author: Steve Martin

quote: If she can't spell, why is she a librarian? Librarians should know how to spell.
author: Ramona Quimby as written by Beverly Cleary

quote: How lucky am I to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Leo, Hazel gasped, I cantmy arms
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Hazel! he yelled. That box! Open it!
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Why do people always expect authors to answer questions? I am an author because I want to ask questions. If I had answers, I'd be a politician.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: The more you talk about it, rehash it, rethink it, cross analyze it, debate it, respond to it, get paranoid about it, compete with it, complain about it, immortalize it, cry over it, kick it, defame it, stalk it, gossip about it, pray over it, put it down or dissect its motives it continues to rot in your brain. It is dead. It is over. It is gone. It is done. It is time to bury it because it is smelling up your life and no one wants to be near your rotted corpse of memories and decaying attitude. Be the funeral director of your life and bury that thing!
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Rae burned me. She has matches or something. Look, look... Tori pulled down the collar of her T-shirt.
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: Intelligent men are dangerous.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: All Dogs Go To Heaven? Sorry, kids. It's only the dogs who've accepted Christ.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: The road to enlightenment is long and difficult, and you should try not to forget snacks and magazines.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Humor was a good way to hide the pain.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: There is only one cure for grey hair. It was invented by a Frenchman. It is called the guillotine.
author: Wodehouse

quote: It seems that the young woman made some indelicate suggestion of a threesome...When I got there, Miss Nash was standing by the hot tub in a small bikini, pointing the business end of a SIG-Sauer P-226 at her fella and concerned members of the hotel staff, while dunking the scantily clad female's head under the water and asking, Who's diving for clams now, bitch?
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: A tiger only needs three things to be comfortable. Lots of food, sleep, andactually, no its just those two things.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: I'd been willing to kill for the people I loved for a very long time; now I had to start living for them.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: Rock 'n' roll is not red carpets and MySpace friends, rock'n'roll is dangerous and should piss people off
author: Gerard Way

quote: Dear Non-American Black, when you make the choice to come to America, you become black. Stop arguing. Stop saying I'm Jamaican or I'm Ghanaian. America doesn't care.
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quote: Don't stop I tease in a seductive voice.  Give me more, Ben. Did you read eBooks or... I run my finger slowly down his chest.
author: Colleen Hoover

quote: You're like a tornado of bullshit right now. We'll talk again when your bullshit dies out over someone else's house.
author: Justin Halpern

quote: V shook his head. Remember what you saw in that clearing, cop? Howd you like that anywhere near a female you loved?
author: J.R. Ward

quote: Is it time for your period, or something?
author: Linda Howard

quote: Claim whatever you want. Say you only want a happy family or a successful career or a big house. I say: no, that's not what you want. You'll settle for those things, but you really want a monkey that does your evil bidding. Pullman is a genius just for this.
author: Maureen Johnson

quote: Before I speak, I have something important to say.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: Only Irish coffee provides in a single glass all four essential food groups: alcohol, caffeine, sugar and fat.
author: Alex Levine

quote: I have dozens of loyal fans! Baker's dozens! they come in thirteens.
author: Felicia Day

quote: When things are at their blackest, I say to myself, 'Cheer up, things could be worse.' And sure enough, they get worse.
author: Robert Asprin, editor

quote: The only way a woman can ever reform a man is by boring him so completely that he loses all possible interest in life.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A friend is someone who knows where all your bodies are buried. Because they're the ones who helped you put them there.
author: Jenny  Lawson

quote: Holmes and Watson are on a camping trip. In the middle of the night Holmes wakes up and gives Dr. Watson a nudge. Watson he says, look up in the sky and tell me what you see.
author: Thomas Cathcart, Daniel Klein

quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
author: Janet Dailey

quote: I can't abide people who go soft over animals and then cheat every human they come across!
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: Sweatpants are a sign of defeat. You lost control of your life so you bought some sweatpants.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: She's so small, yet she contains so much evil.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Paris answered for him. Last time he spread the flashing love, Reyes threw up all over his shirt. I never laughed so hard in my life. Lucien, though, has no sense of humor and vowed never to take us again.
author: Gena Showalter

quote: Hallucinations are bad enough. But after awhile you learn to cope with things like seeing your dead grandmother crawling up your leg with a knife in her teeth. Most acid fanciers can handle this sort of thing. But nobody can handle that other trip-the possibility that any freak with $1.98 can walk into the Circus-Circus and suddenly appear in the sky over downtown Las Vegas twelve times the size of God, howling anything that comes into his head. No, this is not a good town for psychedelic drugs.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Well, Fang said, mimicking a thick Southern drawl. I must say its mighty nice of them Daimons to clean up after themselves when you kill them He held his hands up to them. Look Ma, no mess.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: The more excited I get, the more I vibrate.
author: Karen Marie Moning

quote: Dont put off till tomorrow anyone you could be doing today.
author: Emma Chase

quote: There's no room for demons when you're self-possessed.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: I like the sound of that, crashing Monica's party, he glanced at Michael, then quickly away. What about you? That break some kind of vampire rules or something?
author: Rachel Caine

quote: It turned out I was pretty good in science. But again, because of the small budget, in science class we couldn't afford to do experiments in order to prove theories. We just believed everything. Actually, I think that class was called Religion. Religion class was always an easy class. All you had to do was suspend the logic and reasoning you were being taught in all the other classes.
author: George Carlin

quote: [Calvin and Hobbes are playing Scrabble.]
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Having a great intellect is no path to being happy.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: He whipped out his sheet, then pulled it over himself and wrapped it tightly around his face like an old woman in a shawl.
author: James Dashner

quote: ...There are too many idiots in this world. And having said it, I have the burden of proving it.
author: Frantz Fanon

quote: His eyes widened just a bit, his lips flexed. I realized he was trying not to laugh. I hate it when people find my threats amusing.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: She shrugs.Men
author: Cynthia Hand

quote: People usually asked her if she had a belly button. Of course she had a belly button. She couldn't explain how. She didn't really want to know.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: An elite confederacy of nerds. My peeps
author: Kathy Reichs

quote: You dont need no gun control, you know what you need? We need some bullet control. Men, we need to control the bullets, thats right. I think all bullets should cost five thousand dollars five thousand dollars per bullet You know why? Cause if a bullet cost five thousand dollars there would be no more innocent bystanders.
author: Chris Rock

quote: Don't bite off more than you can chew because nobody looks attractive spitting it back out.
author: Carroll Bryant

quote: I think fish is nice, but then I think that rain is wet, so who am I to judge?
author: Douglas Adams

quote: I wonder if you can refuse to inherit the world.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Rules and school are tools for fools! I don't give two mules for rules.
author: Trenton Lee Stewart

quote: If you don't get everything you want, think of the things you don't get that you don't want.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: That's a sweet piece, said Jean, briefly forgetting to be aggravated. You didn't snatch that off a street.
author: Scott Lynch

quote: Where I come from, we're more about efficiency,' he replies. 'A knife like this'll skewer food, smear butter, and slit throats all at the same time.
author: Marie Lu

quote: I love you above all things, even pie.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Yes, my tiara sets off the whole thing nicely, said Auntie Muriel in a rather carrying whisper. But I must say, Ginevra's dress is far too low-cut.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: If you sit down and think about it
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: I think the very word stalking implies that you're not supposed to like it. Otherwise, it would be called 'fluffy harmless observation time'.
author: Molly Harper

quote: You know you have ADD when Look A chicken - T-shirt
author: Darynda Jones

quote: I'm seven hundred years old, Alexander. I know when something isn't going to work. You won't even admit I exist to your parents.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: There's a difference between preferring books to parties and preferring sixteen cats to seeing the light of day.
author: Lauren Morrill

quote: Years from now, when I'm successful and happy, ...and he's in prison... I hope I'm not too mature to gloat.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: He who can, does. He who cannot, teaches.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Why did Mother ask you to help me rescue Gelsi? I asked Leif.
author: Maria V. Snyder

quote: Another werewolf thing. Like most animals, we spent a large part of our lives engaged in the three Fs of basic survival. Feeding, fighting and... reproduction.
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: Charlie whistled Amazing Grace as he drove. It was all I could do not to whip my head around and snap, Are you kidding me? Couldn't he pick something more appropriate, like Shout at the Devil or Don't fear the Reaper? Some people had no sense of the proper music for a kidnapping.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Did you get notes for me?
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: There are four simple ways for the observant to tell Mr. Croup and Mr. Vandemar apart: first, Mr. Vandemar is two and a half heads taller than Mr. Croup; second, Mr. Croup has eyes of a faded china blue, while Mr. Vandemar's eyes are brown; third, while Mr. Vandemar fashioned the rings he wears on his right hand out of the skulls of four ravens, Mr. Croup has no obvious jewelery; fourth, Mr. Croup likes words, while Mr. Vandemar is always hungry. Also, they look nothing at all alike.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Ayame: Yuki, let's deepen the bond between us brothers!
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: Somewhere, the zebra is dancing.
author: Garth Stein

quote: If reassurances could dull pain, nobody would ever go to the trouble of pressing grapes.
author: Scott Lynch

quote: Georgie, stop trying to resurrect the shoes. They were never alive in the first place.
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: I love Mickey Mouse more than any woman I have ever known.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Okay, seriously, I dont know if this is true or not, but I heard people who use profanity are trying to compensate for their lack of you know... size -Tuck
author: Simone Elkeles

quote: This college would probably have the same problem as the last one did.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: If Christ were here there is one thing he would not bea Christian.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I never hated a man enough to give him his diamonds back.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: The road to creativity passes so close to the madhouse and often detours or ends there.
author: Ernest Becker

quote: In the present case it is a little inaccurate to say I hate everything. I am strongly in favor of common sense, common honesty and common decency. This makes me forever ineligible to any public office of trust or profit in the Republic. But I do not repine, for I am a subject of it only by force of arms.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: He smiled at that, and then his gaze shifted to a spot over my shoulder and it faded. 'These doubts wouldnt have anything to do with the company youre keeping of late, would they?'
author: Karen Chance

quote: I actually like how doctors talk. I like the sound of science. I like how words you don't understand explain things you can't understand.
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: Grover wore his fake feet and his pants to pass as human. He wore a green rasta-style cap, because when it rained his curly hair flattened and you could just see the tips of his horns. His bright orange backpack was full of scrap metal and apples to snack on. In his pocket was a set of reed pipes his daddy goat had carved for him, even though he only knew two songs: Mozart's Piano Concerto no. 12 and Hilary Duff's So Yesterday, both of which sounded pretty bad on reed pipes.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Often it does seem such a pity that Noah and his party did not miss the boat.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Of course, it is boring to read about boring thing, but it is better to read something that makes you yawn with boredom than something that will make you weep uncontrollably, pound your fists against the floor, and leave tearstains all over your pillowcase, sheets, and boomerang collection.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Caliph Vathek and his dark horde
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Don't care for her tongue, do you? How strange. I find it one of my favorite parts.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: The problem with doing nothing is that you never know when you're finished.
author: Nelson DeMille

quote: And then Jack chopped down what was the world's last beanstalk, adding murder and ecological terrorism to the theft, enticement, and trespass charges already mentioned, and all the giant's children didn't have a daddy anymore. But he got away with it and lived happily ever after, without so much as a guilty twinge about what he had done...which proves that you can be excused for just about anything if you are a hero, because no one asks inconvenient questions.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: The leading cause of death among fashion models is falling through street grates.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Death didn't bother me much. Strong Christian and all that. Method of death did. Being eaten alive. One of my top three ways not to go out.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: The French have a new president, the British will soon have a new P.M., and we envy them as we endure the endless wait for this small dim man to go back to Texas and resume his life.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: Frank didnt drop you on purpose, she said. Hes not like that. Hes just a little clumsy sometimes.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Writing is the only profession where no one considers you ridiculous if you earn no money.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Call me sentimental, but there's no-one in the world that I'd like to see get dysentery more than you
author: David Nicholls

quote: When in trouble or in doubt, run in circles, scream and shout.
author: Cory Doctorow

quote: Oh, don't mind me, came an extremely sarcastic voice near the wall. You two go ahead and make outI'll just sit here and bleed quietly.
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: Emergency dance party--go away.
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: Niall had been able to mask the odor of fairy from Eric in the restaurant, but I saw from the flare of Eric's nostrils that the intoxicating scent clung to me. Eric's eyes closed in ecstasy, and he actually licked his lips. I felt like a T-bone just out of reach of a hungry dog.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: We need to remember what's important in life: friends, waffles, work. Or waffles, friends, work. Doesn't matter, but work is third.
author: Leslie Knope

quote: I spilled more times than a glass of milk on a roller coaster.
author: Scott Westerfeld

quote: If you ever put a student at this school in danger again-'
author: Ally Carter

quote: Molly: So how do you think of Bryce Hamilton crowd so far? Boys hot enough for you?
author: Alexandra Adornetto

quote: [Myrnin to Claire about their costumes of Pierrot and Harlequin, respectively]
author: Rachel Caine

quote: The truth is, every son raised by a single mom is pretty much born married. I don't know, but until your mom dies it seems like all the other women in your life can never be more than just your mistress.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Just wait until he figures out I shut him out of his slut hut.
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: I dont believe in astrology; Im a Sagittarius and were skeptical.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: If you want to catch beasts you don't see every day,
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Well enough, I reply. Remember, youre drunk. And happy. Youre supposed to be lusting over your escort. Try smiling a little more.
author: Marie Lu

quote: Tell you what, you let me go, and Ill ask you plenty of questions about your race. Until then, Im slightly distracted with how this little vacation on the good ship Holy Sh*t is going to pan out for me.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.
author: Jim Henson

quote: Um...Mercer? Haven't seen you in nearly a month. I was expecting something like, 'Oh Cross, love of my heart, fire of my loins, how I've longed--
author: Rachel Hawkins

quote: If you think I'm going to let six people risk their lives - !'
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Look! said Foaly, pointing with some urgency into the vast steel-gray gloom, Someone who cares!
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: I'm a werewolf trapped in a human body.
author: Carrie Vaughn

quote: I need to look like an idiot at least twice a day to keep myself humble.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Katniss: 'What about you? Ive seen you in the market. You can lift hundred pound bags of flour'. I snap at him
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: If you die in an elevator, be sure to push the up button.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: When I'm out of politics I'm going to run a business, it'll be called rent-a-spine
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: You would not enjoy Nietzsche, sir. He is fundamentally unsound.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: You have a very open relationship with your fans.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Id heard you were dead.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: Any idiot can put up a website.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: And Nate? You kiss like a slobbering dog, you have bad breath, and you wouldn't know how to punch the right buttons on a girl if we came with manuals. Happy Thanksgiving, Jackass.
author: Elizabeth Eulberg

quote: The merest accident of microgeography had meant that the first man to hear the voice of Om, and who gave Om his view of humans, was a shepherd and not a goatherd. They have quite different ways of looking at the world, and the whole of history might have been different. For sheep are stupid, and have to be driven. But goats are intelligent, and need to be led.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: I'm writing an unauthorized autobiography.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I know this goes without saying, but Stonehenge really was the most incredible accomplishment. It took five hundred men just to pull each sarsen, plus a hundred more to dash around positioning the rollers. Just think about it for a minute. Can you imagine trying to talk six hundred people into helping you drag a fifty-ton stone eighteen miles across the countryside and muscle it into an upright position, and then saying, 'Right, lads! Another twenty like that, plus some lintels and maybe a couple of dozen nice bluestones from Wales, and we can party!' Whoever was the person behind Stonehenge was one dickens of a motivator, I'll tell you that.
author: Bill Bryson

quote: Ford carried on counting quietly. This is about the most aggressive thing you can do to a computer, the equivalent of going up to a human being and saying Blood...blood...blood...blood...
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Tried living in the real world instead of a shell, but I was bored before I even began.
author: Morrissey

quote: To me you are a work of art, and I would give you my heart - that's if I had one.
author: Morrissey

quote: No, I really did. I walked into that room and saw the hottest, sexiest guy I've ever seen - wet and half naked. And I said, E
author: Nicole Christie

quote: She came awake, stomach rumbling, and opened her eyes to see a plate being held right under her nose.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: You climbed into my window in the middle of the night. So, either you're some kind of Vampire or some kind of Perv. Which is it?
author: Kami Garcia

quote: I had no desire to hear another woman tell my boyfriend how hot he was. If I wanted him to know, I'd damn well tell him myself.
author: Rachel Vincent

quote: Down with tyranny!' Bramble cried. 'Aristocracy! Autocracy! Monocracy! Other ocracy things! You are outnumbered, sir!
author: Heather Dixon

quote: ...slow and drunk is no match for fast and scared shitless.
author: Ransom Riggs

quote: Percy was getting tired of water.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Actors are so fortunate. They can choose whether they will appear in tragedy or in comedy, whether they will suffer or make merry, laugh or shed tears. But in real life it is different. Most men and women are forced to perform parts for which they have no qualifications. Our Guildensterns play Hamlet for us, and our Hamlets have to jest like Prince Hal. The world is a stage, but the play is badly cast.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Spike (to Giles) : Oh, poor Watcher. Did your life pass before your eyes  'Cuppa tea, cuppa tea... almost got shagged... cuppa tea'?
author: Marti Noxon, Buffy the Vampire Slayer

quote: This is a mournful discovery.
author: Philip K. Dick

quote: A genius. A criminal mastermind. A millionaire. And he is only twelve years old.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: No, I do my torturing in the dungeon like any other respectable castle owner,
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: FABLEHAVEN: None who enter will leave unchanged. Trespassers will be turned to stone.
author: Brandon Mull

quote: Your as slow as a fat kid on crutches
author: P.C. Cast

quote: Some have brains, and some haven't, ... and there it is.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: Hes a love-em-and-leave-em kind of guy. And though hes not a Lord, he does have a curse hanging over his head. I have the book to prove it.
author: Gena Showalter

quote: Im very much down to earth, just not this earth.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: Getting you a date to prom is so hard that the hypothetical idea itself is actually used to cut diamonds, I added. Radar tapped a locker twice with his fist to show his approval, and then came back with another. Ben, getting you a date to prom is so hard that the American government believes the problem cannot be solved with diplomacy, but will instead require force.
author: John Green

quote: As far as I can tell, there are two basic (kissing) rules: 1. Don't bite anything without permission. 2. The human tongue is like wasabi: it's very powerful, and should be used sparingly.
author: John Green

quote: What grinds me the most is we're sending kids out into the world who don't know how to balance a checkbook, don't know how to apply for a loan, don't even know how to properly fill out a job application, but because they know the quadratic formula we consider them prepared for the world`
author: Chris Colfer

quote: One of the major problems encountered in time travel is not that of becoming your own father or mother. There is no problem in becoming your own father or mother that a broad-minded and well-adjusted family can't cope with. There is no problem with changing the course of historythe course of history does not change because it all fits together like a jigsaw. All the important changes have happened before the things they were supposed to change and it all sorts itself out in the end.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: So many things to see, people to do.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Things on the essential list: vodka, Nine Inch Nails, a steady supply of mortal men, and an all-purpose bitchy attitude.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: His mouth captured hers, trying to show her with his kiss what he was still learning to express in words. He loved her. He worshipped her. He'd walk across fire for her. He
author: Julia Quinn

quote: I told my wife the truth. I told her I was seeing a psychiatrist. Then she told me the truth: that she was seeing a psychiatrist, two plumbers, and a bartender.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Being a leader is making the people you love hate you a little more each day.
author: Patrick Ness

quote: You make me smile like the sun, fall out bed, sing like a bird, dizzy in my head. Spin like a record crazy on a sunday night. You make me dance like a fool, forget how to breath, shine like the sun buzz like a bee, just the thought of you can drive me wild. Oh you make me smile. -Uncle Kracker-
author: Uncle Kracker

quote: Jace suggested that the cast of Gilligan's Island could go do something anatomically unlikely with themselves.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Likest thou jelly within thy doughnut?
author: Jim Butcher

quote: If absolute power corrupts absolutely, where does that leave God?
author: George Deacon

quote: Write to please just one person. If you open a window and make love to the world, so to speak, your story will get pneumonia.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Women intrinsically understand human dynamics, and that makes them unstoppable. Unfortunately, the average man is less adroit at fostering such rivalries, which is why most men remain average; males are better at hating things that can't hate them back (e.g., lawnmowers, cats, the Denver Broncos, et cetera). They don't see the big picture.
author: Chuck Klosterman

quote: How are you feeling?
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: Will put his hand on Nico's shoulder. Nico, we need o have another talk about your people skills.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: You're getting into some kind of shape, cop.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: Did someone just call me the
author: Rick Riordan

quote: In a totally sane society, madness is the only freedom.
author: J.G. Ballard

quote: Anyone who knew the word slattern was worth cultivating as a friend.
author: Alan Bradley

quote: I don't need anything to get high. I'm high on life.
author: Melissa de la Cruz

quote: I wish someone had just told me the truth right up front, as soon as I was old enough to understand it. I wish someone had just said: Heres the deal, Wade. Youre something called a human being. Thats a really smart kind of animal. Like every other animal on this planet, were descended from a single-celled organism that lived millions of years ago. This happened by a process called evolution, and youll learn more about it But trust me, thats really how we all got here. Theres proof of it everywhere, buried in the rocks. That story you heard? About how we were all created by a super-powerful dude named God who lives up in the sky? Total bullshit. The whole God thing is actually an ancient fairy tale that people have been telling one another for thousands of years. We made it all up. Like Santa Claus and the Easter Bunny. Oh, and by the way  theres no Santa Claus or Easter Bunny. Also bullshit. Sorry, kid Deal with it.
author: Ernest Cline

quote: Yes, we'll yell, 'Help, help us, goose girl, and bring the terrifying legion of warrior geese'.
author: Shannon Hale

quote: Simon: So were you following me? Or is it just an amazing coincidence that you happened to be on the roof of a building I was walking by when I got attacked?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Humor is mankind's greatest blessing.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I am a man, and men do not drink pink drinks. Now, be gone, woman, and fetch me something brown. Jace said.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: I was just kidding, shuck-face, Minho said. Let's all go over there. She could have an army of psycho girl ninjas hiding in that shack of hers.
author: James Dashner

quote: In theory, there is no difference between theory and practice. But in practice, there is.
author: Benjamin  Brewster

quote: The attempt to develop a sense of humor and to see things in a humorous light is some kind of a trick learned while mastering the art of living.
author: Viktor Emil Frankl

quote: This emotion I'm feeling now, this is love, right?
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: The cord pulled taut and she rebounded, flying back up before falling again. As her velocity slowed, she opened her eyes and found herself dangling at the end of the cord, about five feet above Jace. He was grinning.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Yes, men are pigs. Except your brother, of course. He's actually a decent human being. Almost a woman.
author: Gena Showalter

quote: What makes you think that Valentine's change of plans had anything to do with your brother?
author: cassandra clare

quote: Remember, Jesus would rather constantly shame gays than let orphans have a family.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: Nobody comes here anymore, its too crowded
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Get there early because hope does not park your mother-fucking car.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: Do you know people who insist they like 'all kinds of music'? That actually means they like
author: Chuck Klosterman

quote: Don't leave it all unsaid,
author: Morrissey

quote: You see, I, unlike you, have been made a prefect, which means that I, unlike you, have the power to hand out punishments.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: I don't know about your true form, but the weight of your ego sure is pushing the crust of the earth toward the breaking point.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: That's kind of a leap, but the Russian judge gave you a nine point five for style, so okay.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: I am your sire. I am to guide you through your first days as a vampire. Your first feeding is a rite of passage, a sacrament. It will not be wasted on some hormone-driven frenzy. This is why I wanted you to feed from me.
author: Molly Harper

quote: Jace snorted so loudly that she turned on him with a frown. He wiggled his mud-caked fingers at her. His nails were black crescents. Filthy inside and out.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: You see, wire telegraph is a kind of a very, very long cat. You pull his tail in New York and his head is meowing in Los Angeles. Do you understand this? And radio operates exactly the same way: you send signals here, they receive them there. The only difference is that there is no cat.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It was a lame excuse, and I knew that wasn't the reason he was canceling. If he wanted to avoid me, I would have preferred he made up something about how he and the other guardians had to up Moroi security or practice top-secret ninja moves.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: So, have a little fun. Soon enough you'll be dead and burning in Hell with the rest of your family.
author: George Carlin

quote: You can knock on a deaf man's door forever.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Of course, it is quite possible to be in the dark in the dark, but there are so many secrets in the world that it is likely that you are always in the dark about one thing or another, whether you are in the dark in the dark or in the dark not in the dark, although the sun can go down so quickly that you may be in the in the dark about being in the dark, only to look around and find yourself no longer in the dark about being in the dark, but in the dark in the dark nontheless, not only because of the dark, but because of the ballerinas in the dark, who are not in the dark about the dark, but also not in the dark about the locked cabinet, and you may be in the dark about the ballerinas digging up the locked cabinet in the dark, even though you are no longer in the dark about being in the dark, and so you are in fact in the dark about being in the dark, even though you are not in the dark about being in the dark, and so you may fall into the hole that the ballerinas have dug, which is dark, in the dark, and in the park.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: And besides... I dont want to leave you. Er, you guys.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: Lead me not into temptation; I can find the way myself.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: You mean other than the wings? I once ate nine snicker bars in a row without barfing. It was a record.
author: James Patterson

quote: Close your eyes and picture it. Can you see it?
author: Alyson Noel

quote: Adam's response was buried in the sound of the first-story door falling open. Noah slouched in. In a wounded tone, he said, He threw me out the window!
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: Isn't it strange that I know you'd risk your life to save mine, but I don't even know what your favorite color is?
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: I swear, talking to you is like talking to a really good-looking and mildly stupid brick wall.
author: Derek Landy

quote: I've been embarrassing myself since about birth.
author: Phil Lester

quote: if something is there, you can only see it with your eyes open, but if it isn't there, you can see it just as well with your eyes closed. That's why imaginary things are often easier to see than real ones.
author: Norton Juster

quote: Come on guys, you cant fight like this forever
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Oh! it is absurd to have a hard-and-fast rule about what one should read and what one shouldn't. More than half of modern culture depends on what one shouldn't read.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You wanna go build some shelves with me?
author: Alexandra Bracken

quote: The magician stood erect, menacing the attackers with demons, metamorphoses, paralyzing ailments, and secret judo holds. Molly picked up a rock.
author: Peter S. Beagle

quote: The first ten million years were the worst, said Marvin, and the second ten million years, they were the worst too. The third ten million years I didn't enjoy at all. After that I went into a bit of a decline.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: It isn`t premarital sex if you have no intention of getting married.
author: Drew Carey

quote: I went to a bookstore and asked the saleswoman, 'Wheres the self-help section?' She said if she told me, it would defeat the purpose.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I can win an argument on any topic, against any opponent. People know this, and steer clear of me at parties. Often, as a sign of their great respect, they don't even invite me.
author: Dave Barry

quote: The figures looked more or less human. And they were engaged in religion. You could tell by the knives (it's not murder if you do it for a god).
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Want coffee? I asked, as I headed that way.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Believe me, It would be better if we didn't meet again. Go back to school. Go back to your life. And next time they ask you, say no. Killing is for grown-ups and you're still a child.
author: Anthony Horowitz

quote: The other night I was lying in bed, looking up at the stars, and I wondered, 'Where the hell is my roof?
author: Steven Wright

quote: Cut my pie into four pieces, I dont think I could eat eight.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Put some clothes on, you weird, yellow-eyed, table-dancing, werewolf-training, cryptic, stare-me-right-in-the-eyes-and-don't-even-blink wench.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Im fine, Mom. Thanks for asking.
author: Susan Ee

quote: The trick. . .is to find the balance between the bright colors of humor and the serious issues of identity, self-loathing, and the possibility for intimacy and love when it seems no longer possible or, sadder yet, no longer necessary.
author: Wendy Wasserstein

quote: Before I leave the bathroom, I pinch my cheeks hard to bring blood to the surface of my skin. Its stupid, but I dont want to look weak and exhausted in front of everyone.
author: Veronica Roth

quote: I have a terrible memory; I never forget a thing.
author: Edith Konecky

quote: I am in full possession of the amazing power of being sarcastic.
author: Sarah Rees Brennan

quote: I don't get high, but sometimes I wish I did. That way, when I messed up in life I would have an excuse. But right now there's no rehab for stupidity.
author: Chris Rock

quote: If I ever form a clan, we'll be the anti-cheerleaders and walk under the bleacher forming mild acts of mayhem.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funnybone.
author: Reba McEntire

quote: Alec? Magnus was staring at him. He had dispatched the remaining Iblis demons, and the square was empty but for the two of them. Did you just- did you just save my life?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: You are my whole heart, Scarlet. And this is breaking it.'
author: A.C. Gaughen

quote: But we're going to smile and pretend we're fine with the dorky birthmas gifts because people do not get that they can't mush a birthday into christmas.
author: P.C. Cast

quote: I guess the sacrifice of my dignity is the only thing that will save us now. The things I endure for love. The Fates laugh at my torment.
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: Explanations exist; they have existed for all time; there is always a well-known solution to every human problemneat, plausible, and wrong.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Perhaps you are thinking: 'But a tank costs several million dollars, not including floor mats. I don't have that kind of money.'
author: Dave Barry

quote: Everyone has a photographic Memory, some just don't have film.
author: Steven Wright

quote: You did not just say that. I have a feeling we're on the verge of hugging and coming up with cute nicknames for each other.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: I never did give them hell. I just told the truth, and they thought it was hell.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: Civilization is vastly overrated.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: You must have been going very fast.
author: Anthony Horowitz

quote: I have a hobby. I have the worlds largest collection of sea shells. I keep it scattered on beaches all over the world. Maybe youve seen some of it.
author: Steven Wright

quote: No one believes youre serious until bodies start to fall. -Vlad
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Orion brightened. I have an idea.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: When life hands you a lemon, say, 'Oh yeah, I like lemons! What else ya got?
author: Henry Rollins

quote: How do I define history? It's just one fucking thing after another
author: Alan Bennett

quote: Why on earth would you buy a car like this if you can't drive a stick? There are dozens of cars--new cars--that have automatic transmission. It'd be a million times easier.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: Cam's wings were so bright they were almost blinding as they pulsed.
author: Lauren Kate

quote: People use the word 'love' a lot of different ways. Take me, for instance. I am often heard saying that I love my mom and dad. I am also often heard saying that I love pizza.
author: Mary Beth Bonacci

quote: I love money. I love everything about it. I bought some pretty good stuff. Got me a $300 pair of socks. Got a fur sink. An electric dog polisher. A gasoline powered turtleneck sweater. And, of course, I bought some dumb stuff, too.
author: Steve Martin

quote: They can't tell so much about you if you got your eyes closed.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: This was not a fairy-tale castle and there was no such thing as a fairy-tale ending, but sometimes you could threaten to kick the handsome prince in the ham-and-eggs.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: If everyone in the world sat quietly at the same time, closed their eyes and concentrated as hard as they could on peace and goodwill, all the killing and cruelty in the world would continue. And probably increase.
author: George Carlin

quote: rolf! what? are you really rolling on the floor laughing? well, please stay down there for a sec while I KICK YOUR ASS.
author: David Levithan

quote: ...[G]reat progress was evident in the last Congress of the American 'Labour Union' in that among other things, it treated working women with complete equality. While in this respect the English, and still more the gallant French, are burdened with a spirit of narrow-mindedness. Anybody who knows anything of history knows that great social changes are impossible without the feminine ferment. Social progress can be measured exactly by the social position of the fair sex (the ugly ones included).
author: Karl Marx

quote: You humans, always eating. I'll make you soup. You can eat it while you keep working. Myrnin set aside his book and walked into the back of the lab.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: Saphira waved her tail, the tip whistling loudly. I'm not asking you to. However, if we attack first, we may gain the advantage.
author: Christopher Paolini

quote: Must be weird for you, having your mom here.
author: Rachel Hawkins

quote: Ride? Rhage snorted. Please. That thing is a sewing machine with an air dam taped to it. My GTO could dust the fucker in fourth gear from a dead stop.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: A word to the wise is infuriating.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: So the first thing we're gonna do, I told him, is push you off the roof.
author: James Patterson

quote: When I was in school the teachers told me practice makes perfect; then they told me nobodys perfect so I stopped practicing.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Three be the things I shall never attain:
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: Yes, vanity is a weakness indeed. But pride - where there is a real superiority of mind, pride will be always under good regulation.
author: Jane Austen

quote: If I was made of cake I'd eat myself before somebody else could.
author: Emma Donoghue

quote: Here's an easy way to figure out if you're in a cult: If you're wondering whether you're in a cult, the answer is yes.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: Enormous? Did you just call me FAT? I am not fat. - Jace
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: I never met a man that I didn't like.
author: Will Rogers

quote: I've seen more intelligence in the crotch lice of harem whores.
author: Christopher Moore
