quote: I, myself, have killed six people. All random, all undetected, no way to trace them to me. And, let me tell you, there's nothin' like it. It's a great feeling. Yeah, I know, you're thinking. 'Aw, he's a comedian. He's just sayin' that stuff.' Good. That's exactly what I want you to think.
author: George Carlin

quote: Um, Doc said in a mild voice, medically speaking, I'm not sure that was the most helpful thing for his condition.
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: At the end of a miserable day, instead of grieving my virtual nothing, I can always look at my loaded wastepaper basket and tell myself that if I failed, at least I took a few trees down with me.
author: David Sedaris

quote: Fortunately, among werewolf women, the word bitch is not offensive. I was having a lot of fun with that.
author: Molly Harper

quote: Cause I'm Irish, and everyone remembers me.
author: Niall Horan

quote: Girls are so queer you never know what they mean. They say no when they mean yes, and drive a man out of his wits just for the fun of it.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: No people whose word for 'yesterday' is the same as their word for 'tomorrow' can be said to have a firm grip on the time.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: This paper, by its very length, defends itself from ever being read.
author: Winston S. Churchill

quote: What? Its not my blood!
author: Abigail Roux

quote: This is so cool, I said loudly as Dad walked away. Have you met the tattoo artist? Is he hot? He's a she, Mom said. Is she hot? Cause I'm still young, you know. My sexual identity isnt fully formed. Your father can't hear you anymore, Maya. Mom sighed.
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: He studied my appearance carefully. You cut your hair. Yes. Do you like it? That depends. How long is it? I pulled a curl down and showed him it ended just past my shoulder. He grunted, Thats still long enough, so I like it. Long enough for what? Long enough for a man to run his hands through.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: In the world according to Garp, we are all terminal cases
author: John Irving

quote: Harry Dresden. Saving the world, one act of random destruction at a time.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: He's not doing anything he shouldn't be doing, right?
author: Rachel Caine

quote: It was impossible to get the Dimitri and Tasha thing out of my head, but at least packing and getting ready made sure I didn't devote 100 percent of my brain power to him. More like 95 percent.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: If moneys the god people worship, Id rather go worship the devil instead.
author: Jess C Scott

quote: Wow. I didnt think it was possible for him to look any more intoxicating than he already did. But a leather clad Ren standing next to the gorgeous racing motorcycle holding his helmet made my brain go numb. I had kind of a this-is-your-brain-on-drugs moment, only mine was more like a this-is-your-brain-on-seeing-Ren-in-tight-leather moment. If theyd been smart, the Ducati Company should have used him in a commercial and given him the bike for free.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: There's only one rule you need to remember: laugh at everything and forget everybody else! It sounds egotistical, but it's actually the only cure for those suffering from self-pity.
author: Anne Frank

quote: In love, as in life, one misheard word can be tremendously important. If you tell someone you love them, for instance, you must be absolutely certain that they have replied I love you back and not I love your back before you continue the conversation.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: She's the kind of girl who climbed the ladder of success wrong by wrong.
author: Mae West

quote: Some kids get called 'bundles of joy' or 'slices of heaven' or 'dreams come true.' We got 'the fifty-fourth generation of DNA experiments.' Doesn't have the same warm and fuzzy feel. But maybe I'm oversensitive.
author: James Patterson

quote: If you're right & I'm not, I'm going to be hell to live with, she said. So, you better think about that next time you want to be right.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: I think part of being a parent is trying to kill your kids.
author: Stephen King

quote: All I know is just what I read in the papers, and that's an alibi for my ignorance.
author: Will Rogers

quote: That woman doesn't have the sense God gave a retarded flea.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Having children is like living in a frat house - nobody sleeps, everything's broken, and there's a lot of throwing up.
author: Ray Romano

quote: Some are born weird, some achieve it, others have weirdness thrust upon them.
author: Dick Francis

quote: The downside of my celebrity is that I cannot go anywhere in the world without being recognized. It is not enough for me to wear dark sunglasses and a wig. The wheelchair gives me away.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: So what else can I tell you? I asked. I mean, to get you to reveal Lily to me.
author: David Levithan

quote: Canada is a myth people made up to entertain children, like the Tooth Fairy. Theres no such place.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Two things that matter to me. Emotional resonance and rocket launchers.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: I never understood how men could remember all those details about sports but, yet, were incapable of remembering where they set their car keys or wallet.
author: Tina Reber

quote: My formula for life is very simple: in the morning, wake up; at night, go to sleep. In between I try and occupy myself as best I can.
author: Cary Grant

quote: You think I'd cheat on you? I demanded with all the innocent outrage I could muster.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: Hush Hattie! I said, intoxicated with my success. I don't want to go to my room. Everyone must know I shan't marry the prince. I ran to the door to our street, opened it, and called out into the night, I shan't marry the prince. I turned back into the hall and ran to Char and threw my arms about his neck. I shan't marry you. I kissed his cheek. He was safe from me.
author: Gail Carson Levine

quote: You know how to shoot?- Emma
author: Kerrelyn Sparks

quote: Fire wants to burn
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Speed eliminates all doubt. Am I smart enough? Will people like me? Do I really look all right in this plastic jumpsuit?
author: David Sedaris

quote: Millard! Who's the prime minister?
author: Ransom Riggs

quote: If I behave as though this is a completely normal situation, then maybe it will be ...
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote: Did I hurt your feelings again? Sorry. When this is all over I'll send some flowers to your inner child.
author: Richard Kadrey

quote: Halt you villains! Unhand that science!
author: Noelle Stevenson

quote: Other than the voices in my head, I think Im pretty normal.
author: Tom Upton

quote: George Bush isn't Hitler. He could be if he applied himself.
author: Margaret Cho

quote: You know how it is when you're reading a book and falling asleep, you're reading, reading... and all of a sudden you notice your eyes are closed? I'm like that all the time.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Normal people can become very annoying if put in annoying situations.
author: Jessica Park

quote: We do need a system, and we do need you and your 'Bertos, and sometimes we need Sam to just come along and kick some ass. - Quinn
author: Michael  Grant

quote: There is a proverbial saying chiefly concerned with warning against too closely calculating the numerical value of un-hatched chicks.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: They don't fit you? V asked his roommate.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: A telkhine was hunched over a console, but he was so involved with his work, he didn't notice us. He was about five feet tall, with slick black seal fur and stubby little feet. He had the head of a Doberman, but his clawed hands were almost human. He growled and muttered as he tapped on his keyboard. Maybe he was messaging his friends on uglyface.com.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: I'm a girl of extremes. When I love something, I'm like a puppy dog (without all the licking). When I'm cranky, I'm a wasp (like a whole hive of 'em). And when I'm angry, I'm a Mother Bear with a predator after her cubs: Dangerous.
author: James Patterson

quote: Music is crucial. Beyond no way can I overstress this fact. Let's say you're southbound on the interstate, cruising alone in the middle lane, listening to AM radio. Up alongside comes a tractor trailer of logs or concrete pipe, a tie-down strap breaks, and the load dumps on top of your little sheetmetal ride. Crushed under a world of concrete, you're sandwiched like so much meat salad between layers of steel and glass. In that last, fast flutter of your eyelids, you looking down that long tunnel toward the bright God Light and your dead grandma walking up to hug you--do you want to be hearing another radio commercial for a mega, clearance, closeout, blow-out liquidation car-stereo sale?
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Men seldom make passes at girls who wear glasses.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: I have a great mind to believe in Christianity for the mere pleasure of fancying I may be damned.
author: Lord Byron

quote: i told you he'd freak out, she siad. didn't i?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: If toast always lands butter-side down, and cats always land on their feet, what happens if you strap toast on the back of a cat and drop it?

quote: You know how spooky Ashwini is. She called an hour ago to tell me she has a secret stash of handheld grenade launchers she thought I might want to know about. My response was, 'What the fuck?

quote: Punctuation, is? fun!

quote: Total non-retention has kept my education from being a burden to me.
author: Flannery O'Connor

quote: Truth would quickly cease to be stranger than fiction, once we got as used to it.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: You would be amazed how many magicians have died after being bitten by mad rabbits. It's far more common than you might think.
author: Christopher Paolini

quote: Im going to tell you something once and then whether you die is strictly up to you, Westley said, lying pleasantly on the bed. What Im going to tell you is this: drop your sword, and if you do, then I will leave with this baggage herehe glanced at Buttercupand you will be tied up but not fatally, and will be free to go about your business. And if you choose to fight, well, then, we will not both leave alive.
author: William Goldman

quote: Why should any guy want to be only friends with a girl? Its like agreeing to be near a chocolate cake and never eat it. Its like sitting in a racing car but not driving it.
author: Chetan Bhagat

quote: Leo had seen Tia Callida in action; she liked knives, snakes and putting babies in roaring fires. Yeah, definitely let's unleash her rage. Great idea.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: To err is human, to purr is feline.
author: Robert Byrne

quote: The Destiny of Man is to unite, not to divide. If you keep on dividing you end up as a collection of monkeys throwing nuts at each other out of separate trees.
author: T.H. White

quote: There is one other reason for dressing well, namely that dogs respect it, and will not attack you in good clothes.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: As you get older; you've probably noticed that you tend to forget things. You'll be talking with somebody at a party, and you'll know that you know this person, but no matter how hard you try, you can't remember his or her name. This can be very embarassing, especially if he or she turns out to be your spouse.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Writing in English is the most ingenious torture ever devised for sins committed in previous lives. The English reading public explains the reason why.
author: James Joyce

quote: Shigure: JUST LISTEN TO ME FOR A SECOND, KYO!
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: The first time you see something that you have never seen before, you almost always know right away if you should eat it or run away from it.
author: Scott Adams

quote: Another relative? Valek asked.
author: Maria V. Snyder

quote: An Assassin, a real Assassin, had to look like one - black clothes, hood, boots, and all. If they could wear any clothes, any disguise, then what could anyone do but spend all day in a small room with a loaded crossbow pointed at the door?
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Life sucks, then you die. Then it sucks again.
author: Tonya Hurley

quote: There are two ways to look at life. The first view is that nothing stays the same and that nothing is inherently connected, and that the only driving force in anyone's life is entropy. The second is that everything pretty much stays the same (more or less) and that everything is completely connected, even if we don't realize it.
author: Chuck Klosterman

quote: I know how to use a fellytone now.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Grabbing a scarf off the chair, I threw it at him.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: You're kidding, Shane said. Do you think I want to visit Crazy McTeeth in his lair of insanity?
author: Rachel Caine

quote: Sure, she said, and hugged the laptop bag closer. What could go wrong?
author: Rachel Caine

quote: Did you eat my Twinkies?
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quote: Men dont realize that if were sleeping with them on the first date, were probably not interested in seeing them again either.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

quote: When something needs to be said, you look for a man to say it. But when something needs actually to be done, you look for a woman.
author: P.B. Kerr

quote: I'm not sure if there's one right place I'm supposed to be, he said, but I know a couple of wrong places I'd give a second try in a heartbeat.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: I am charging you with the protection of my mother and friends, not to mention keeping my younger self off the Internet. He is as dangerous as Opal.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: I've got a theory, it could be bunnies...
author: Joss Whedon Buffy the Vampire Slayer

quote: I've got to keep breathing. It'll be my worst business mistake if I don't.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Ceres wanted a united front in the plant war.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Evelyn was an insomniac so when they say she died in her sleep, you have to question that.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: Humor can get in under the door while seriousness is still fumbling at the handle.
author: G.K. Chesterton

quote: You saw my leg?
author: Shannon Hale

quote: Ive been thinking.
author: Victoria Schwab

quote: Well, man, you know what they say.
author: Bo Burnham

quote: Hugh consoled me, saying, Don't let it get to you. There are plenty of things you're good at.
author: David Sedaris

quote: And so the dentist says 'Rinse.' So you lean over, and you're lookin' at this miniature toilet bowl.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: The food was so good that with each passing course, our conversation devolved further into fragmented celebrations of its deliciousness:
author: John Green

quote: Merda! Her lace panties had snagged on his ring, the signet ring he'd inherited from his father, Giacomo Casanova. His father had seduced hundred of women without any problems whatsoever, and he was having trouble with just one. This was the real reason he never used the Casanova name. He could never live up to his father's reputation. The old man was probably laughing in his grave.
author: Kerrelyn Sparks

quote: Eagles may soar, but weasels don't get sucked into jet engines.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Home is where, when you go there and tell people to get out, they have to leave.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: And spare me the jokes about scoring.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Comedy is the art of making people laugh without making them puke.
author: Steve Martin

quote: I'm a Christian first, and a mean-spirited, bigoted conservative second, and don't you ever forget it. You know who else was kind of divisive in terms of challenging the status quo and the powers-that-be of his day? Jesus Christ.
author: Ann Coulter

quote: We spend the first 12 months of our children's lives teaching them to walk and talk and the next 12 months teaching them to sit down and shut up.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: I have never heard a lady say 'arse,' the emperor said mildly.
author: Alison Goodman

quote: Earrings are like orgasms. You can never have too many.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: One time I actually cleaned out my closet so good I ended up on the cover of Time magazine.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: You cant know, sweetie, because youve never had a baby become a brilliant young reader with a side interest in horrible television shows, but the joy you bring us is so much greater than the sadness we feel about your illness.
author: John Green

quote: Who wants to go down the creepy tunnel inside the tomb first?
author: Ann  Lloyd

quote: Oliver laughed - actually laughed.I like this new Claire, he said.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: No, thanks, said Harry. The toilet's never had anything as horrible as your head down it it might be sick. Then he ran, before Dudley could work out what he'd said.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: She wondered if it was her stupid mother, the goddess of love, messing with her thoughts. If Piper started getting urges to read fashion magazines, she was going to have to find Aphrodite and smack her.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: I've never created a riot before. I did cause a brawl at the last formal. A large number of young women there actually arrived with the expectation of seducing me into matrimony, and a couple of their mothers came to blows. It was hilariI mean, dreadful. Simply dreadful.
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: When you get a thing the way you want it, leave it alone.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Take care of the sense and the sounds will take care of themselves.
author: Lewis Carroll

quote: I let out a laugh that sounded more like the yip of a startled poodle. Superp-powers? I wish. My powers aren't winning me a slot on the Cartoon Network anytime soon... except as a comic relief. Ghost Whisperer Junior. Or Ghost Screamer, more like it. Tune in, every week, as Chloe Saunders runs screaming from yet another ghost looking for her help.
author: Kelley Armstrong

quote: She frowned at me. You need some rest. You look like hell. And you're obviously tired enough to have gotten the giggles.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: We need to gather everyone we can.
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: I disapprove of matrimony as a matter of principle.... Why should any independent, intelligent female choose to subject herself to the whims and tyrannies of a husband? I assure you, I have yet to meet a man as sensible as myself! (Amelia Peabody)
author: Elizabeth Peters

quote: Tarzan-like men are my weakness, apparently.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: She'd met Colin on a Monday.
author: Julia Quinn

quote: It usually takes me two or three days to prepare an impromptu speech.
author: Mark Twain

quote: People have hope because they cannot see Death standing behind them.
author: Tite Kubo

quote: I've got to start listening to those quiet, nagging doubts.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: I don't understand how people can
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Elaine: Ugh, I hate people.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Yesterday I was a dog. Today I'm a dog. Tomorrow I'll probably still be a dog. Sigh! There's so little hope for advancement.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: I feel an almost overwhelming interest in the methods of daylight abduction employed by the modern youth.
author: Georgette Heyer

quote: I love writing, but hate starting. The page is awfully white and it says, 'You may have fooled some of the people some of the time but those days are over, Giftless. I'm not your agent and I'm not your mommy: I'm a white piece of paper. You wanna dance with me?' and I really, really don't. I'll go peaceable-like.
author: Aaron Sorkin

quote: Well, my love, said Alexia with prodigious daring to Lord Maccon, shall we? The earl started to move forward and then stopped abruptly and looked down at her, not moving at all. Am I?
author: Gail Carriger

quote: Izzy, are you he began. His eyes flew wide, and he backed up fast enough to smack his head into the wall behind him. What is he doing here?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Wrath: What the hell are you supposed to ask?
author: J.R. Ward

quote: Right, you've got a crooked sort of cross... He consulted Unfogging the Future. That means you're going to have 'trials and suffering'  sorry about that  but there's a thing that could be the sun... hang on... that means 'great happiness'... so you're going to suffer but be very happy...
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: One glance and I knew exactly who and what he was. The classic alpha male, the kind who had spurred evolution forward about five million years ago by nailing every female in sight. They charmed, seduced, and behaved like bastards, and yet women were biologically incapable of resisting their magic DNA.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: Don't run I never liked fast food
author: Rachel caine

quote: Tessa exploded I am not asking you to maul me in the Whispering Gallery! By the Angel, Will, would you stop being so polite?!
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: I'm so pretty, it's hard for me to think of myself as intelligent.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Perhaps not, said Will, who had ears like a bat's. But I would make a radiant bride.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Claire was struggling through last summers diary volume when Myrnin popped in through the portal, wearing a big floppy black hat and a kind of crazy/stylish pimp coat that covered him from neck to ankles, black leather gloves, and a black and silver walking stick with a dragons head on it. And, on his lapel was a button that said, If you can read this, thank a teacher.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: I have never read The Joy of Crap. Sounds disgusting. I have, however, read The Joy of Sex. Not in a while, but I think it's one of those classics you can come back to again... and again.
author: Michelle Hodkin

quote: I ripped my left arm out of his hand and slammed my elbow into his solar plexus. He exhaled in a gasp. I lunged for the dagger and sat on top of him, my knees pinning his arms, my dagger on his throat.
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: I past another telkhine, who was so startled he dropped his Lil' Demons lunch box. I left him alive - partly because he had a cool lunch box...
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Politics is not a bad profession. If you succeed there are many rewards, if you disgrace yourself you can always write a book.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: We spend money that we do not have, on things we do not need, to impress people who do not care.
author: Will Smith

quote: Reality depresses me. I need to find fantasy worlds and escape in them.
author: Noel Fielding

quote: Look. Survey. Inspect. My hair is ruined! I look like a pan of bacon and eggs!
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: Riley : Do you want to claw at me, kitty-cat? Come on.
author: Nalini Singh

quote: I came to the table, pulled up a chair, and sat.
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: See, thats the difference, Mauvin said. I suffer a loss and people console me. Royce suffers a loss and whole towns evacuate.
author: Michael J.  Sullivan

quote: It was the first time I was ever in love, and I learned a lot. Before that I'd never even thought about killing myself.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Babe!
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: I'm as pure as the driven slush.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: Vote for the man who promises least; he'll be the least disappointing.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: I felt this awful obligation to be charming or at least have something to say, and the pressure of having to be charming (or merely verbal) incapacitates me.
author: Peter Cameron

quote: No. Don't distract me with your sexy talk.
author: Rachel Hawkins

quote: Pranks vs school= pranks win all day
author: Justin Bieber

quote: Anyway.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: Riza: Without his Alchemy he's just...
author: Hiromu Arakawa

quote: I was raised right  I talk about people behind their backs. It's called manners.
author: Kathy Griffin

quote: And a special thanks for not burning up the whole ship. Including yourself, you daft bum-rag.
author: Scott Westerfeld

quote: I didn't do anyting wrong. All I know is I saw two people struggling to get inside these walls and they [Minho and Alby] couldn't make it. To ignore that because of some stupid rule seemed selfish, cowardly, and... well, stupid. If you want to throw me in jail for trying to save someone's [Alby] life, then go ahead. Next time I promise I'll point at them and laugh, then go eat some of Frypan's dinner. -Thomas
author: James Dashner

quote: Disagreements over money are the biggest cause of divorce.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quote: While I was drying off Maddie after her bath tonight, she said, 'I love you' to me for the first time. It sounded like 'All lub boo,' but I didn't care. To reciprocate, I showed her what an ex-Marine looks like when he cries.
author: Jim Beaver

quote: There was this book Dad used to read to me every night called The Giving Tree. It was a really good book, but the back of it had a picture of the author, this guy named Shel Silverstein.
author: Jeff Kinney

quote: One morning you wake up with more life behind you than in front of you, not being able to understand how its happened.
author: Fredrik Backman

quote: Young people, nowadays, imagine that money is everything.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Above all, if what you've done is stupid, but it works, it ain't stupid.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: After a long, labored sigh, I said, She was really happy when I got there. Im pretty sure she was suicidal when I left.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Yakka foob mog. Grug pubbawup zink wattoom gazork. Chumble spuzz. I love loopholes.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: I had a dream about you last night.. you were holding a pine cone and introducing him as Gerald.
author: Nicole McKay

quote: Before I begin, may I ask how old you are?
author: Christopher Pike

quote: Excruciating agony makes me cranky.
author: Brandon Mull

quote: Look! A trickle of water running through some dirt! I'd say our afternoon just got booked solid!
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Our enemies are innovative and resourceful, and so are we. They never stop thinking about new ways to harm our country and our people, and neither do we.
author: George W. Bush

quote: I think I did pretty well, considering I started out with nothing but a bunch of blank paper.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Adrian was easily distractible by wacky topics and shiny objects.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: So, Belle, what's new today?
author: Harvard Lampoon

quote: Dead. Never been that before. Not even once.
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: I always listen to you. Except when I don't.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: Rule of life. If you bother to ask someones advice, then bother to listen to it.
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote: Damien has died and gone straight to gay boy heaven,' Shaunee said...
author: P.C. Cast and Kristin Cast

quote: Why?' is always the most difficult question to answer. You know where you are when someone asks you 'What's the time?' or 'When was the battle of 1066?' or 'How do these seatbelts work that go tight when you slam the brakes on, Daddy?' The answers are easy and are, respectively, 'Seven-thirty in the evening,' 'Ten-fifteen in the morning,' and 'Don't ask stupid questions.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Slumber party with Dracula, all things considerd why not?
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: A perfect person is easy to love. But when somebody likes all your imperfections, well, that's when you know they really mean it.
author: Michelle Dalton

quote: Funny thing about glass. When you broke the shit up, it got pissed and bit back.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: Cats don't need to be possessed; they're evil on their own.
author: Peter Kreeft

quote: What does hmm have to do with anything? Could you ever use more than five words? All this grunting and minced words make you come acrossprimal.
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quote: Excuse me, Captain. Are you two going to weep salty tears of admiration over a helmet all night, or do we have matters to discuss?
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: What's the use of a great city having temptations if fellows don't yield to them?
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: If we're not supposed to eat animals, how come they're made out of meat?
author: Tom Snyder

quote: I will never deny that life isn't fair. It seems as though when a woman leaves a man she is strong and independent, but when a man leaves a woman he is a pig and a jerk.
author: Criss Jami

quote: I can't forget things, or ignore them-bad things that happen, I said. I'm a lay-it-all-out person, a dwell-on-it person, an obsess-about-it person. If I hold things in and try to forget or pretend, I become a madman and have panic attacks. I have to talk.
author: E. Lockhart

quote: You know your Lamborghini is on fire, right?
author: Meg Cabot

quote: Every passing hour brings the Solar System forty three thousand miles closer to Globular Cluster M13 in Hercules  and still there are some misfits who insist that there is no such thing as progress.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

quote: Talking with you is sort of the conversational equivalent of an out of body experience.
author: Bill Waterson

quote: If someone called me chubby, it would no longer be something that kept me up late at night. Being called fat is not like being called stupid or unfunny, which is the worst thing you could ever say to me. Do I envy Jennifer Hudson for being able to lose all that weight and look smokin hot? Of course, yes. Do I sometimes look at Gisele Bundchen and wonder how awesome life would be if I never had to wear Spanx? Duh, of course. Thats kind of the point of Gisele Bundchen. And maybe I will, once or twice, for a very short period of time. But on the list of things I want to do in my lifetime, thats not near the top. I mean, its not near the bottom either. Id say its right above Learn to drive a vespa, but several notches below film a chase scene for a movie.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: Kools and Newports were for black people and lower-class whites. Camels were for procrastinators, those who wrote bad poetry, and those who put off writing bad poetry. Merits were for sex addicts, Salems were for alcoholics, and Mores were for people who considered themselves to be outrageous but really weren't.
author: David Sedaris

quote: America used to live by the motto Father Knows Best. Now we're lucky if Father Knows He Has Children. We've become a nation of sperm donors and baby daddies.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: *Appendix usually means small outgrowth from large intestine, but in this case it means additional information accompanying main text. Or are those really the same things? Think carefully before you insult this book.
author: Pseudonymous Bosch

quote: Shut up! Eve yelled from somewhere upstairs. Jackass!
author: Rachel Caine

quote: That's not a bad word...hate and war are bad words, but fuck isn't.
author: Judy Blume

quote: When you see what some girls marry, you realize how they must hate to work for a living.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: I have made a lot of mistakes falling in love, and regretted
author: Nora Ephron

quote: You are evidence of your mother's strength, especially if you are a rebellious knucklehead and regardless she has always maintained her sanity.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Who, last time I'd checked, was still on our official archenemy list. (Yes, we have to keep a list. It's kind of sad.)
author: James Patterson

quote: It's so hard to believe in anything anymore. I mean, it's like, religion, you really can't take it seriously, because it seems so mythological, it seems so arbitrary...but, on the other hand, science is just pure empiricism, and by virtue of its method, it excludes metaphysics. I guess I wouldn't believe in anything anymore if it weren't for my lucky astrology mood watch.
author: Steve Martin

quote: In the end, everything is a gag.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: I've always known I was gay, but it wasn't confirmed until I was in kindergarten.
author: David Levithan

quote: People who entered the Courtyard without an invitation were just plain crazy! Wolves were big and scary and so fluffy, how could anyone resist hugging one just to feel all that fur?
author: Anne Bishop

quote: If anger were mileage, I'd be a very frequent flyer, right up there in First Class.
author: Gina Barreca

quote: There's no half-singing in the shower, you're either a rock star or an opera diva
author: Josh Groban

quote: It infuriates me to be wrong when I know I'm right.
author: Molière

quote: Linh Cinder. Such a pleasure. My master has spoken so highly of you.
author: Marissa Meyer

quote: Rule number 2 - don't listen to me! Arriane laughed, I'm certifiably insane!
author: Lauren Kate

quote: From: Anastasia Steele
author: E.L. James

quote: I'm about as intimidating as a butterfly.
author: Dan Howell

quote: It's amazing that the amount of news that happens in the world every day always just exactly fits the newspaper.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: I hate girls that giggle all the time...
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Victor patted my hand. 'I like you, Sky. You're a fighter.'
author: Joss Stirling

quote: I don't have a lot of domestic instincts, Ranger said to me, his attention fixing on the unidentifiable glob in my hair, but I have a real strong urge to take you home and hose you down.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Otis, I said.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Stick your dick in? I asked, my brows probably touching. Did you actually just say that?
author: Kylie Scott

quote: Shuck it, Minho responded. Im tougher than nails. I could still kick your pony-lovin butt with twice this pain.
author: James Dashner

quote: There are any number of magical creatures, mostly female, whose singing can bring about horror and death. Sirens, undines, banshees, Bananarama tribute bands...
author: Simon R. Green

quote: Falling in love is painful on the knees.
author: Bon Jovi

quote: I don't believe there's any problem in this country, no matter how tough it is, that Americans, when they roll up their sleeves, can't completely ignore.
author: George Carlin

quote: His sentences didn't seem to have any verbs, which was par for a politician. All nouns, no action.
author: Jennifer Crusie

quote: When she scooped up her clothes, opened his door, then snapped her fingers for a guard down the hall, Wroth watched like a bystander.
author: Kresley Cole

quote: Not going to walk me to the door? I asked, pretending to be shocked at his lack of gallantry.
author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes

quote: There are always some lunatics about. It would be a dull world without them.
author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Writers block is only a failure of the ego.
author: Norman Mailer

quote: Ichigo: You got that? Huh?! I'm the rescuer, so you just SHUT UP!!
author: Tite Kubo

quote: No matter how calmly you try to referee, parenting will eventually produce bizarre behavior, and I'm not talking about the kids. Their behavior is always normal.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: The more fucked up you are, the more I like you. As long as you've managed to hold onto your identity through all the shit, then it won't matter how twisted you are. I will love you more for it.
author: Ashly Lorenzana

quote: What's that supposed to mean? A wolf's head on a stick. Big wolf barbecue tonight? Bring your own wolf?
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: Joshua's ministry was three years of preaching, sometimes three times a day, and although there were some high and low points, I could never remember the sermons word for word, but here's the gist of almost every sermon I ever heard Joshua give.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Hey, yummy leather guy? Can you hear me? (Amanda)
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: Here's a newsflash from the only High Preistess you have left at this dang school: Zoey isn't dead. And believe me, I know dead. I've been there, done that, and got the frickin' T-shirt. - Stevie Rae
author: P.C. Cast

quote: She led the way. Eyeless sockets of the dead seemed to stare at them as they passed.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: There was a dragon who had a long-standing obsession with a queen's breasts, she said, growing breathless. The dragon knew the penalty to touch her would mean death, yet he revealed his secret desire to the king's chief doctor. This man promised he could arrange for the dragon to satisfy his desire, but it would cost him one thousand gold coins. She spread her soapy hands over his nipples, then down his arms. Though he didn't have the money, the dragon readily agreed to the scheme.
author: Gena Showalter

quote: My Head of House said I lacked certain necessary qualities...like the ability to behave myself.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Horse sense is the thing a horse has which keeps it from betting on people.
author: W.C. Fields

quote: I've learned that you know your husband still loves you when there are two brownies left and he takes the smaller one.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any.
author: Mark Twain

quote: What's in a name, anyway? That which we call a nose by any other name would still smell.
author: The Reduced Shakespeare Company

quote: When I was little I bragged about my firefighting father: my father would go to heaven, because if he went to hell he would put out all the fires
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: To say she was my girlfriend was absurd: no one the wrong side of thirty has a girlfriend I suppose I ought to have realize its ominous that forty thousand years of human language had failed to produce a word for our relationship.
author: Robert   Harris

quote: You know, Miss Holly, you look very dramatic like that, backlit by the fire. Very attractive, if I may say so. I know you shared a moment passionne with Artemis which he subsequently fouled up with his typical boorish behavior. Let me just throw something out there for you to consider while we're chasing the probe: I share Artemis's passion but not his boorishness. No pressure; just think about it.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: Hell's holy stars and freaking stones shit bells.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: A joke is an epigram on the death of a feeling.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Philosophy of science is about as useful to scientists as ornithology is to birds.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Rejection is one thing - but rejection from a fool is cruel.
author: Morrissey

quote: Having solved all the major mathematical, physical, chemical, biological, sociological, philosophical, etymological, meteorological and psychological problems of the Universe except for his own, three times over, [Marvin] was severely stuck for something to do, and had taken up composing short dolorous ditties of no tone, or indeed tune. The latest one was a lullaby.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: You are going to love the sports here. Snow skiing and water-skiing and rock climbing and all kinds of extreme sports. I give you full permission to hurl yourself off stuff.
author: Cynthia Hand

quote: The common man prays, 'I want a cookie right now!' And God responds, 'If you'd listen to what I say, tomorrow it will bring you 100 cookies.
author: Criss Jami

quote: A friend of mine once sent me a post card with a picture of the entire planet Earth taken from space. On the back it said, 'Wish you were here.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Maybe I should, I don't know leave? Because this is starting to sound like one of those reality shows I don't want to be in. Maybe you guys want to take turns in the confessional booth.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: You know, my sister and I cant understand what Dawson sees in you. Youre just a silly little human. His arm shot out so fast it was a blur, picked up a strand of her hair. And youre really not even that pretty.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: Please welcome Professor Varen Nethers, famous depressed dead poets historian and author of the bestselling books
author: Kelly Creagh

quote: Yes, boys are a little like shoes. Why? Well...They can be useful. But mainly...They are nice to look at. Getting the right one can be a lovely accessory to an outfit. There are times when you couldn't do without them. And there are times when you'd rather do without them. Get the wrong ones and they can hurt. There are many types and often the ones that look the nicest are completely unpractical.
author: Rachel Hill

quote: This is me. He handed her the precious scrap of paper. Call me or Ill call you, but one of us will call, yes? What I mean is its not a competition. You dont lose if you phone first.
author: David Nicholls

quote: Dearest creature in creation,
author: Gerard Nolst Trenité

quote: I stayed up all night playing poker with tarot cards. I got a full house and four people died.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Don't be scared of Bambi the demon said. She's only curious and maybe a little bit hungry.
author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quote: Harry, Bob drawled, his eye lights flickering smugly, what you know about women, I could juggle.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Of all the crap, crap, crappy nights I've ever had in the whole of my crap life. On a scale of one to 10, we're talking...a minus 6. And it's not like I even have very high standards.
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote: How long have you been a Wiccan?'
author: Jim Butcher

quote: The trouble was that he was talking in philosophy but they were listening in gibberish.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: You can have everything in the world, but if you don't have love, none of it means crap, he said promptly. Love is patient. Love is kind. Love always forgives, trusts, supports, and endures. Love never fails. When every star in the heavens grows cold, and when silence lies once more on the face of the deep, three things will endure: faith, hope, and love.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: I'm the terrorist, do what I say or I'll terrorize you.
author: D.J. MacHale

quote: It came charging toward me, several hundred pounds of angry-looking monster, and I did the only thing any reasonable wizard could have done.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: All right, then, she snapped, do as you please! Perhaps afterward we could manage a coherent discussion. Twisting beneath him, she flopped onto her stomach.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: And in what fairy tale would John ever be any sane person's idea of Prince Charming anyway? He was the opposite of charming. More like Prince Terrifying.
author: Meg Cabot

quote: Oh, goodie, Puck said as I stepped forward. I'm going to have a rash in the most uncomfortable places.
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: Once again, I've been thwarted by the massive difference between my vision of the successful me and the me I'm currently stuck with.
author: Lauren Graham

quote: If you find it hard to laugh at yourself, I would be happy to do it for you.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I see Atheists are fighting and killing each other again, over who doesn't believe in any God the most. Oh, no..wait.. that never happens.
author: Ricky Gervais

quote: I think a man's wordplay can be so fucking sexy!!! I love a good mind fuck!!
author: Junnita Jackson

quote: It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
author: Aeschylus

quote: I looked to the ceiling and told God, God, next time I want an adventure, strike me with lightning. You have my permission.
author: Kristen Ashley

quote: My tendency to make up stories and lie compulsively for the sake of my own amusement takes up a good portion of my day and provides me with a peace of mind not easily attainable in this economic climate.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: Wayne: You wanna know why I really came to find you?
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: Promise me, Amelie, that youll crucify me with silver before you allow me to fall in love.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: There is a crucifix, a few cloves of garlic, a wooden stake, a hammer, a blob of Silly Putty, and a pocketknife. You do realize these people arent vampires, right? I say when Sam walks back in. Yeah, but you never know. Theyre probably crazy, like you said. And even if we were hunting vampires, what the hell is the Silly Putty for? He shrugs. Just want to be prepared.
author: Pittacus Lore

quote: I know the Goliath Fucking Bird-Eating Spider can't fly because if it could, it would have a different name entirely. We would call it sir because it would be the dominant species on the planet. None of us would leave the house unless a Goliath Fucking Bird-Eating Spider said it was okay
author: David Wong

quote: That dresswas a very, very good decision. I could write an entire poem on the virtues of your legs alone. You are a feast for the senses. I laughed. I dont know about a feast. Maybe just an hors d'oeuvre. He took my hand and wrapped it around his arm. Not an hors d'oeuvre. The dessert. And I plan to spoil my appetite.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: Its like thisa starving man would gladly eat a radish, right? In fact, a radish would be a feast if thats all he had. But if he had a buffet in front of him, the radish would never be chosen.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: Pasteboard pies and paper flowers are being banished from the stage by the growth of that power of accurate observation which is commonly called cynicism by those who have not got it....
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Grandfather informs me that is not possible.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: What's up? [asked Ford.]
author: Douglas Adams

quote: We are like chameleons, we take our hue and the color of our moral character, from those who are around us.
author: John Locke

quote: Then why are you here? Emma demanded. Oh, is this one of those missed-connections things? We met the other night, you felt a spark? Sorry, but I dont date trees.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Murphy hung up and I said, to the still-open line, Hey, if you've got someone watching my place, could you call the cops if anyone tries to steal my Star Wars poster? It's an original.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: We? Simon looked at him in disbelief. Are you ever going home?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: My girlfriend is a party girl angel who can kick some arse and cook.
author: Wendy Higgins

quote: Literature doesnt exactly have a strong mental-health track record.
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Tessa: I won't know if I like it until I try it, will I?
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: I put tape on the mirrors in my house so I don't accidentally walk through into another dimension.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Kyo: Of course, I'll beat YOU, too!
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: It was one of those cases where you approve the broad, general principle of an idea but can't help being in a bit of a twitter at the prospect of putting it into practical effect. I explained this to Jeeves, and he said much the same thing had bothered Hamlet.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Your job is to focus on my personal happiness, she said, & I've got big plans, so break time is over.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: The shortest distance between two people is a smile.
author: Victor Borge

quote: Anything that doesn't take years of your life and drive you to suicide hardly seems worth doing.
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: I couldn't repair your brakes, so I made your horn louder.
author: Steven Wright

quote: I adore Wilkie Collins, Tessa cried. OhArmadale! And The Woman in White
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: Now,I'm no scientist,but I know what endorphins are. They're tiny little magical elves that swim through your blood stream and tell funny jokes to each other. When they reach your brain,you hear what they're saying and that boosts your health and happiness. Knock Knock... Who's There?.. Little endorphin... Little endorphin who?... Little Endorphin Annie. And then the endorphins laugh and then you laugh. See? Its Science.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: Rose took my nose, I suppose, he repeated; the bubble of phlegm in his throat made a disgusting crackle. And it really blows.
author: James Dashner

quote: On a fundamental level, I am someone who would throw sand at children.
author: Allie Brosh

quote: Hespe's mouth went firm. She didn't scowl exactly, but it looked like she was getting all the pieces of a scowl together in one place, just in case she needed them in a hurry.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: I am ever a gentle maiden, she shouted. Damn if I'm not.
author: Julie Garwood

quote: Women speak because they wish to speak, whereas a man speaks only when driven to speak by something outside himself-like, for instance, he can't find any clean socks.
author: Jean Kerr

quote: There's a Polar Bear
author: Shel Silverstein

quote: Come work for me, and Ill tell you.
author: Kim Harrison

quote: His gaze slid over me like a veil of fire. He could ignite my deepest desires with a single glance. I decided right then and there no more reading romance novels by candelight.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Amy, Dan, and Nellie were sitting at a table in a conference room, examining reproductions of Franklin documents-some so rare, the librarians told her, the only copies existed in Paris.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Our love was a two-person game. At least until one of us died, and the other became a murderer.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: See? she heard Shane yell at the kitchen. She doesn't stomp around like a cattle stampede!
author: Rachel Caine

quote: Do you realize how hard it is to keep your mind clear when somebodys telling you to keep your mind clear?
author: Tom Upton

quote: It was one of the dullest speeches I ever heard. The Agee woman told us for three quarters of an hour how she came to write her beastly book, when a simple apology was all that was required.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Tyler lies back and asks, If Marilyn Monroe were alive right now, what would she be doing?
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Do little pink fairies sing and dance in your world, Peabody?
author: J.D. Robb

quote: I can chase you, and I can catch you,
author: Morrissey

quote: Nozy Cat lifted one sleepy eyelid, and his marble blue eye glared at her for interrupting his sacred nap. He wore a yellow collar with little red stars printed on it. His second eyelid also opened, and he gave them his irritated blue-eyed glare.
author: lyn key

quote: The poor things keep calling in those  those pumbles, I think they're called  you know, the ones who mend pipes and things
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Really, I'm trying to care, Artemis, really. But I thought it was all supposed to be over when the fat lady sings. Well, she's singing, but it doesn't appear to be over
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: To Garan's credit, the treatment of Dellian prisoners did change after that. One particularly laconic man, after a session in which Fire learned positively nothing, thanked her for it specifically. Best dungeons I ever been in, he said, chewing on a toothpick.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: A few said they'd be horses. Most said they'd be some sort of cat. My friend said she'd like to come back as a porcupine. I don't like crowds, she said.
author: Brian Andreas

quote: Alphabet: a symbolic system used in algebra, with applications that have yet to be discovered by dyslexics and two thirds of college graduates.
author: Bauvard

quote: In this country we have no place for hyphenated Americans.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: In Paris they just simply opened their eyes and stared when we spoke to them in French! We never did succeed in making those idiots understand their own language.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Mysteries force a man to think, and so injure his health.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I had learned that you should always shout louder than your aggressor.
author: Marjane Satrapi

quote: Fortunately, we did most of our athletic stuff inside, so we didn't have to jog through Tribeca looking like a bunch of boot-camp hippie children.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: How can you protect yourself by carrying a sword if you dont know how to use it?
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Darwin says people like you need to die. (Carrow)
author: Kresley Cole

quote: I'm looking into my past lives. I'm convinced some of them still owe me money.
author: Graham Parke

quote: With the world securely in order, Dain was able to devote the leisurely bath time to editing his mental dictionary. He removed his wife from the general category labeled Females and gave her a section of her own. He made a note that she didn't find him revolting, and proposed several explanations: (a) bad eyesight and faulty hearing, (b)a defect in a portion of her otherwise sound intellect, (c) an inherited Trent eccentricity, or (d) an act of God. Since the Almighty had not done him a single act of kindness in at least twenty-five years, Dain thought it was about bloody time, but he thanked his Heavenly Father all the same, and promised to be as good as he was capable of being.
author: Loretta Chase

quote: When forced to leave my house for an extended period of time, I take my typewriter with me, and together we endure the wretchedness of passing through the X-ray scanner. The laptops roll merrily down the belt, while Im instructed to stand aside and open my bag. To me it seems like a normal enough thing to be carrying, but the typewriters declining popularity arouses suspicion and I wind up eliciting the sort of reaction one might expect when traveling with a cannon.
author: David Sedaris

quote: I didn't know you had a girlfriend, Griggs. Anson Choi feigns surprise. What's her name?
author: Melina Marchetta

quote: Jesus Christ, will you quit dictating this conversation to Hannah?' I grumble. 'Bros before hos, dude.'
author: Elle Kennedy

quote: You should be home sleeping. What is the use of having a man in the house, if he cannot take care of you for a while?
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: Thomas: Is it [my brain] fixed?
author: James Dashner

quote: As we all know, blinking lights means science.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: Can you squeeze me
author: Morrissey

quote: I thought you said you were the one in charge! Ce'Nedra exclaimed.
author: David Eddings

quote: Religion is like a blind man looking in a black room for a black cat that isn't there, and finding it.
author: Anonymous

quote: Who knew hitting my head and passing out would be so much fun?
author: P.C. Cast

quote: Well, I believe she went in to rescue some Raggers from the pits, Cuffs said. She wasnt all that specific.
author: Cinda Williams Chima

quote: Selfish, adj. Devoid of consideration for the selfishness of others.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I'd never met coffee that wasn't wonderful. It was just a matter of how
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: The Lord is my shepherd. I shall not want for nothing. He makes me lie down in the green pastures. He greases up my head with oil. He gives me kung-fu in the face of my enemies. Amen
author: Stephen King

quote: Cheaters never prosper. (Because they suck.)
author: Greg Behrendt

quote: I'm not a vegetarian! I'm a dessertarian!
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Always watch where you are going. Otherwise, you may step on a piece of the Forest that was left out by mistake.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: The Prince found Buttercup waiting unhappily outside his chamber doors.
author: William Goldman

quote: Merlins beard.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: That's ridiculous. Especially the part about Christian being manly.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: And here's something else, another problem you might have: Suppose your prayers aren't answered. What do you say? Well, it's God's will. Thy Will Be Done. Fine, but if it's God's will, and He's going to do what He wants to anyway, why the fuck bother praying in the first place? Seems like a big waste of time to me! Couldn't you just skip the praying part and go right to His Will? It's all very confusing.
author: George Carlin

quote: I can't give a Professor love!
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Some pains are physical, and some pains are mental, but the one that's both is dental.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: ... for most practical purposes, Tarbean had two parts: Waterside and Hillside. Waterside is where people are poor. That makes them beggars, thieves and whores. Hillside is where people are rich. That makes them solicitors, politicians and courtesans.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: Razo hopped back up and adopted a posture that said he was completely unruffled, never had been, and in fact was ready to do something manly like lift boulders or swallow live worms.
author: Shannon Hale

quote: Women don't want all that. Women just want a partner who is considerate and attentive, who will spoon with them while reciting Keats, and feed them organic yogurt by candlelight on a seaside cliff at sunset.

quote: Where does a werewolf sleep? Anywhere he wants to.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: A morning coffee is my favorite way of starting the day, settling the nerves so that they don't later fray.

quote: It looks as though your shop is doing well, Luka said gazing around, Could you help me find a gift for a lady friend of mine?
