quote: TANDAAN: mahirap mafriendzone, pero madali lang gumanti!
author: Ramon Bautista

quote: Arianne had her feet up on the table, wearing a striped conductor's cap.
author: lauren kate

quote: That craptastical, gutless, son-of-a-cactus-humping butt monkey!!
author: Gemma Halliday

quote: In the words of the philosopher Sceptum, the founder of my profession: am I going to get paid for this?
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: I couldn't claim that I was smarter than sixty-five other guys--but the average of sixty-five other guys, certainly!
author: Richard P. Feynman

quote: It doesnt matter what temperature a room is, its always room temperature.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Instant gratification takes too long.
author: Carrie Fisher

quote: Babe, Ranger said. You're looking a little strung out. Is there anything I should know?
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quote: And if humanity is the last war, then I am the battlefield.
author: Rick Yancey

quote: I'd love to...but only with you.
author: Morrissey

quote: I had a dream about you. I was sitting on your couch, relating my succession of ideas on subconscious influence. I asked you what they meant, and you told me that free associations were a bad way to advance my political career.
author: Bauvard

quote: Leo: I'm almost out of gas! Woah, that came out wrong. I meant the burning kind!
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Every ounce of my cynicism is supported by historical precedent.
author: Glen Cook

quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning
author: George Carlin

quote: Her majesty is one verb short of a sentence.
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: If you would not be forgotten, as soon as you are dead and rotten, either write things worth reading, or do things worth writing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Guns are our friends because in a country without guns, I'm what's known as prey. All females are.
author: Ann Coulter

quote: Sometimes I can't figure designers out. It's as if they flunked human anatomy.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Properly practiced, knitting soothes the troubled spirit, and it doesn't hurt the untroubled spirit either.
author: Elizabeth Zimmerman

quote: When we were almost to the other campus, I felt the weird nausea hit me. I called a warning to Christian, just as a Strigoi grabbed him. But Christian was fast. Flames wreathed the Strigoi's head. He screamed and released Christian, trying frantically to put the flames out. The Strigoi never saw me coming with the stake. The whole thing took under a minute. Christian and I exchanged looks.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: The philosopher
author: Anthony de Mello

quote: I bet you anything that 10 times out of 10, Nicky, Vinny and Tony will beat the shit out of Todd, Kyle and Tucker.
author: George Carlin

quote: If I was on the road to Hell, at least I was going in style.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Humor is also a way of saying something serious.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: What a refreshing mind you have, young man. There really is nothing quite like total ignorance, is there?
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: A crossbow? Pigeon asked.
author: Brandon Mull

quote: I'm a 21st-century kid trapped in a 19th-century family.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Give the People what they want - and they'll get what they deserve.
author: The Kinks

quote: A mother, you son-of-a-bitch, is sacred!
author: Andrzej Sapkowski

quote: She seemed to be a nice person, too, instead of a homicidal bitch like his former wife. Otherwise, the world should fear. When Mencheres fell for a woman, he fell hard. If Kira asked for her own continent as a birthday present, Mencheres would probably have one conquered for her before she blew out her candles.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: To paraphrase Oedipus, Hamlet, Lear, and all those guys, I wish I had known this some time ago.
author: Roger Zelazny

quote: I am perfectly qualified to give you an injection. You're not going to tell me you're afraid of a little prick?
author: Anthony Horowitz

quote: The idealist hopes. The romantic sees doom. The postmodernist sees doom and hopes.
author: Bauvard

quote: I hate women who complain about being fat when they're like a size 5. Anything under size 5 isn't a woman. It's a boy with breasts.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: On Wednesday, when the sky is blue,
author: A.A. Milne

quote: It'd Be a Lot Cooler If You Did.
author: Matthew McConaughey

quote: You thought I was a werewolf? Dervish asks.
author: Darren Shan

quote: I'm your friend, and friends don't let friends die.
author: C.B. Cook

quote: All of those faeries and duels and mad queens and so on, and no one quoted old Billy Shakespeare. Not even once.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Garrick was panting when he replied, Youre not forcing me to do anything. I just want you to be sure. You can say stop at anytime. His lips pulled wide. You dont need to make up a new pet.
author: Cora Carmack

quote: Those guys who want to have the Mohawk...which, to me, is the new business casual.
author: Gerard Way

quote: Frank stared at her. But you throw Ding Dongs at monsters.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: What's that?
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: Was he a good kisser, Ms. Lane? Barrons asked, watching me carefully.
author: Karen Marie Moning

quote: It was sad music. But it waved its sadness like a battle flag. It said the universe had done all it could, but you were still alive.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Just as I had long suspected, a person didn't really need math for anything anyway. Maybe some people did. Some limited people.
author: Augusten Burroughs

quote: Artemis: Right, brothers. Onward. Imagine yourself seated at a cafe in Montmartre.
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: Wikipedia is the first place I go when I'm looking for knowledge... or when I want to create some.
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: He smiled in a way that made me want to kiss him right on the spot. Or the lips. Whichever was closer.
author: Shannon Hale

quote: Plans are invitation to disappointment.
author: Derek Landy

quote: The Swiss have an interesting army. Five hundred years without a war. Pretty impressive. Also pretty lucky for them. Ever seen that little Swiss Army knife they have to fight with? Not much of a weapon there. Corkscrews. Bottle openers. Come on, buddy, lets go. You get past me, the guy in the back of me, hes got a spoon. Back off, Ive got the toe clippers right here.
author: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: Oh, sweetie, I'm sorry, you can't have a baby brother, because that would mean that Daddy had sex, and that's never going to happen again.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Granny was an old-fashioned witch. She didnt do good for people, she did right by them.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: A whizzpopper! cried the BFG, beaming at her. Us giants is making whizzpoppers all the time! Whizzpopping is a sign of happiness. It is music in our ears! You surely is not telling me that a little whizzpopping if forbidden among human beans?
author: Roald Dahl

quote: I used to think Romeo and Juliet was the greatest love story ever written. But now that Im middle-aged, I know better. Oh, Romeo certainly thinks he loves his Juliet. Driven by hormones, he unquestionably lusts for her. But if he loves her, its a shallow love. You want proof? Cagney didnt wait for Dr. Victor to say yay or nay.
author: J. Conrad Guest

quote: The integrity of my sleep has been forever compromised, sir.
author: David Foster Wallace

quote: Could we wear spandex and blow things up?
author: Lisa Mantchev

quote: No, my friend, I am not drunk. I have just been to the dentist, and need not return for another six months! Is it not the most beautiful thought?
author: Agatha Christie

quote: Hearts can't be broken because they're made of marzipan.
author: Kerstin Gier

quote: I was sorry to have my name mentioned as one of the great authors, because they have a sad habit of dying off. Chaucer is dead, Spencer is dead, so is Milton, so is Shakespeare, and Im not feeling so well myself.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Dear God in heaven.
author: Shelly Laurenston

quote: I happen to be immature, undisciplined, and self-centered, pretty much a little boy in a man's body, although I'd appreciate it if you didn't quote me on that.
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quote: Normal is just a setting on your dryer.
author: Patsy Clairmont

quote: The one I felt and still feel most is lack of time. I used to have time to think, to reflect, my mind and I. We would sit together of an evening and listen to the inner melodies of the spirit, which one hears only in leisure moments when the words of
author: Helen Keller

quote: Will you quit shouting and let me bleed in peace!
author: Ransom Riggs

quote: well just call me Hannibal Lecter. With cleavage.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Although golf was originally restricted to wealthy, overweight Protestants, today it's open to anybody who owns hideous clothing.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Even now, despite Angeline's watchfulness, she'd occasionally oscillate between random topics, like how shepherd's pie wasn't a pie at all and why it was pointless for her to take class in typing when technology would eventually develop robot companions to do it for us.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: I rode an elevator with a guy who was whistling the tune of 'this is the song that never ends'. Putting that on me? Come on dude..
author: Taylor Swift

quote: I mean to say, I know perfectly well that I've got, roughly speaking, half the amount of brain a normal bloke ought to possess. And when a girl comes along who has about twice the regular allowance, she too often makes a bee line for me with the love light in her eyes. I don't know how to account for it, but it is so.
author: Wodehouse

quote: Insanity runs in my family, it practically gallops
author: Joseph Kesselring

quote: My capacity for happiness, he added, you could fit into a matchbox without taking out the matches first
author: Douglas Adams

quote: I think you learn more if you're laughing at the same time.
author: Mary Ann Shaffer & Annie Barrows

quote: The ultimate sexist put-down: the prick which lies down on the job. The ultimate weapon in the war between the sexes: the limp prick. The banner of the enemy's encampment: the prick at half-mast. The symbol of the apocalypse: the atomic warhead prick which self-destructs.
author: Erica Jong

quote: I don't know why it should be, I am sure; but the sight of another man asleep in bed when I am up, maddens me.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: Let a smile be your umbrella, and you'll end up with a face full of rain.
author: George Carlin

quote: since i will not send this, i also feel it is my duty to inform you that almost six months on I think I still love you and that makes me sad becaue love shouldnt feel this way. is like getting kicked in the stomach every time i think of you and it makes me want to roll my face across this keyboardbiu;///ubEWdcfhugiovbyhi;.//////-=-0i9juh8ygtfdcsaazs34defg7uefg7u8hi9o0p8hi9o0p-[[09ju8dcsaazs34d9o0p-[[09.
author: Jay Kristoff

quote: I'm the crazy girly captain, Remember?
author: Eoin Colfer

quote: You could shove it up your ass and pretend you're a corn dog.
author: Ernest Cline

quote: I would so hate to be a first-person character! Always on your guard, always having people read your thoughts!
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: Bluestar blinked. There are cats who would argue that there should never have been a fifth Clan in the forest at all. Why are there four oaks at Fourtrees, if not to stand for the four Clans?
author: Erin Hunter

quote: This is the fast lane, folks...and some of us like it here.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: I was happy in the haze of a drunken hour, but heaven knows I'm miserable now.
author: Morrissey

quote: The Hitch Hiker's Guide to the Galaxy offers this definition of
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Now stand in the corner, and think about what you've done!
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Nobody will ever win the battle of the sexes. There is too much fraternizing with the enemy.
author: Henry Kissinger

quote: How is it that little children are so intelligent and men so stupid? It must be education that does it
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Because he has the best equipment in the City and he knows how to use it!
author: Ilona Andrews

quote: You couldn't be satisfied with being an amateur asshole, could you, Jimbo! You had to go and turn pro on me!
author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quote: Camping is nature's way of promoting the motel business.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Huging my pillow to my chest, I told myself, At least soon you won't have so much time to miss him. Soon school will start again, and then you'll be busier.
author: Claudia Gray

quote: I will describe my eyes and then begin the story. My eyes are blue and resplendent. Now I will begin the story.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: Doing business without advertising is like winking at a girl in the dark. You know what you are doing but nobody else does.
author: Steuart Henderson Britt

quote: Professors of literature collect books the way a ship collects barnacles, without seeming effort.
author: Amanda Cross

quote: For the record, I would like to point out that it is NOT being obsessive to memorize a boy's schedule so that you can accidentally bump into him. It is called being efficient.
author: Jess Rothenberg

quote: I have never met any really wicked person before. I feel rather frightened. I am so afraid he will look just like every one else.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: She fitted into my biggest arm-chair as if it had been built round her by someone who knew they were wearing arm-chairs tight about the hips that season
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Humor is a spontaneous, wonderful bit of an outburst that just comes. It's unbridled, its unplanned, it's full of suprises.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Bite me, Goth princess, Shane called from the back. Not literally or anything.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: One of my professors once told me that the last official act of the British monarchy was when Queen Victoria refused to sign a law that made same-sex acts illegal. It would have made me think more highly of her, except the reason she objected was because she didnt believe women would do anything like that. Parliament rewrote the law so it was specific to men, and she signed it. A tribute to enlightenment, Queen Victoria was not. Neither, as I have observed before, are werewolf packs.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: Sometimes the most remarkable things seem commonplace. I mean when you think about it jet travel is pretty freaking remarkable. You get in a plane it defies the gravity of a entire planet by exploiting a loophole with air pressure and it flies across distances that would take months or years to cross by any means of travel that has been significant for more than a century or three. You hurtle above the earth at enough speed to kill you instantly should you bump into something and you can only breathe because someone built you a really good tin can that seems tight enough to hold in a decent amount of air. Hundreds of millions of man-hours of work and struggle and research blood sweat tears and lives have gone into the history of air travel and it has totally revolutionized the face of our planet and societies.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: I had a polynomial once. My doctor removed it.
author: Michael  Grant

quote: Marry me, he says. I got all my own teeth, I wash twice a year an I'll cut you in fer half the business here.
author: Moira Young

quote: Do you find this...distracting?
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: All persons, living and dead, are purely coincidental.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: I'm trying to make some sense out of the phrase Everything happens for a reason, and I think I've figured out what the reason is - to pissed me off.
author: Cecilia Ahern

quote: 'Tell Suzie she's a lucky cat.' Have sexier words ever been spoken?
author: Ally Carter

quote: But Grovers voice was already growing fainter. Sweet dreams. Dont let me die!
author: Rick Riordan

quote: You can run from the grave, but you can't hide.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Ransom really looked at the other man for the first time, shook his head, stared again. Holy hell, your eyes are like a fucking vipers.
author: Nalini Singh

quote: My relationship with my father had been on the proverbial fritz since the time I was fifteen and called the police to report him for child molesting. He had never molested me, but I wanted to have a party that weekend and needed him out of the house.
author: Chelsea Handler

quote: There are things that are so serious that you can only joke about them.
author: Werner Heisenberg

quote: I do not, I felt oddly appalled by her statement. I'm an excellent liar. Ask my dentist. He swears I floss regularly.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Revenge is sweet and not fattening.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Housework won't kill you, but then again, why take the chance?
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: It's all bullshit, folks and it's bad for ya.
author: George Carlin

quote: Oh that looked painful, called another Puck, a little farther down. We really need to talk about your anger-management problems.
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: You can read minds, and you didn't tell me? Link stared at me like he just found out I was the Silver Surfer. He rubbed his head nervously. Hey, man, all that stuff about Lena? I was yankin your chain. He looked away. Are you doin it now? You're doin it, aren't you? Dude, get out of my head. He backed away from me and into the bookshelf.
author: Kami Garcia

quote: He specialized in the murder of dreams, Hazel Grace...
author: John Green

quote: If Marilyn Monroe was alive right now, what would she be doing?'
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: The inhabitants of the earth are of two sorts: those with brains, but no religion, and those with religion, but no brains.
author: Al-Maʿarri

quote: I love being in love, but I also love other things, like not being jealous, overly sensitive, or needy.
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

quote: To say I had some pent-up anger would be like saying Britney Spears had minor impulse-control issues.
author: Molly Harper

quote: She gave Samuel a stern look. Now, I don't know what's going on between you and my daughter and Adam Hauptman
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: Programming today is a race between software engineers striving to build bigger and better idiot-proof programs, and the Universe trying to produce bigger and better idiots. So far, the Universe is winning.
author: Rick Cook

quote: This is the problem with forever friends. They know too much.
author: Kristin Hannah

quote: Why would you throw a ball in someone's face?...Huh. That's a pretty good reason. Well, I can't do much about your teacher being pissed, but me and you are good.
author: Justin Halpern

quote: God, if you ever loved me, open my eyes for me when I'm being this stupid! (Ron)
author: Kim Harrison

quote: I sheathed my blade and glared at him. And here I almost thought you weren't a complete bastard.
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: Compromise is a stalling between two fools.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: There's a meeting in Command. Disregard your current schedule,' he says.
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: Pulling the chair out for me, he invited me to sit.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: Otrera stayed dead the second time, Kinzie said, batting her eyes. We have to thank you for that. If you ever need a new girlfriend...well, I think you'd look great in an iron collar and an orange jumpsuit.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: That's it, cupcake. You're going down.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: OK, Josh said evenly, I've seen men made of mud, I guess I can accept spying rats. Do they talk? he wondered aloud.
author: Michael Scott

quote: Bad kitty! he screeched, snarling and baring his fangs at Grimalkin, who yawned and turned away to groom his tail. Evil, evil, sneaky kitty! Bite your head off in your sleep, I will! Hang you by your toes and set you on fire! Burn, Burn!
author: Julie Kagawa

quote: I think we're too young to be dating. I mean I don't see what the rush is. Summer says.
author: R.J. Palacio

quote: I hate the vamp jobs. They think they're so suave. It's not enough for them to slaughter and eat you like a zombie would. No, they want to be all sexy, too. And trust me: vampires? Not. Sexy.
author: Kiersten White

quote: CUSTOMER: Do you have this children's book I've heard about? It's supposed to be very good. It's called Lionel Richie and the Wardrobe.
author: Jen Campbell

quote: I don't know where people got the idea that characters in books are supposed to be likable. Books are not in the business of creating merely likeable characters with whom you can have some simple identification with. Books are in the business of creating great stories that make you're brain go ahhbdgbdmerhbergurhbudgerbudbaaarr.
author: John Green

quote: You know, I can see more than just the future or the past.
author: Rachel Hawkins

quote: Heartache often drives us to consume things we wouldn't otherwise, such as an entire pint of Caramel Pecan Perfection high-fat ice cream, covered in ganache, the crack cocaine of frozed dairy. Twelve hundred calories per pint, six hundred and eighty of which are fat calories, but is only dulls the pain for the moment, there's that carb fog while you're standing at the sink shoving it in your face, and then it's over and you feel...used. Like a cheap pickup the Dove people seduced and abandoned in your kitchen, leaving you with sticky hands and an empty cup and a still-broken heart, except now you're mad at Dove, too.
author: Jennifer Crusie

quote: I'm amazing and studly, but I have limits.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: If there is anyone here whom I have not insulted, I beg his pardon.
author: Johannes Brahms

quote: All I really wanted to do was cuddle back under the blankets, maybe with a certain stuffed toy penguin I knew. Yeah, hiding sounded good.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: Stupidity is much the same all the world over. A stupid person's notions and feelings may confidently be inferred from those which prevail in the circle by which the person is surrounded. Not so with those whose opinions and feelings are an emanation from their own nature and faculties.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: I alternate between feeling sympathetic toward humanity and being a misanthrope. When I'm sympathetic, it usually means I haven't been around people in awhile.
author: John R Lindensmith

quote: As for Gussie Finknottle, many an experienced undertaker would have been deceived by his appearance and started embalming on sight.
author: Wodehouse

quote: When I was One,
author: A.A. Milne

quote: If 50 million people say something foolish, it is still foolish.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: This was very exciting. I'd never had two boys get into a fight over me before. The fact that one of the boys was my stepbrother, however, and held about as much romantic appeal for me as Max, the family dog, somewhat dampened my enthusiasm. And Michael wasn't much of a catch, either, when you actually thought about it, being a potential murderer and all. Oh, why did I have to have such a couple of losers fighting over me? Why couldn't Matt Damon and Ben Affleck fight over me? Now that would be truly excellent.
author: Meg Cabot

quote: He had about the same life expectancy as a three legged hedgehog on a six lane motorway.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: I don't mind foreigners. God save the queen! he squeaked and ran.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: He was a gentle and sensitive soul, and therefore had a short temper, which is why he went straight after everything with an ax...
author: Bohumil Hrabal

quote: We made too many wrong mistakes.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: Rosie get off your desk, and please put your beard away.
author: Louise Rennison

quote: Life is All About How you Handle Plan B
author: Suzy Toronto

quote: How do you deal with it? Kami asked Jared. The laughing at nothing and occasionally stopping dead in your tracks.
author: Sarah Rees Brennan

quote: People think first love is sweet, and never sweeter than when that first bond snaps. You've heard a thousand pop and country songs that prove the point; some fool got his heart broke. Yet that first broken heart is always the most painful, the slowest to mend, and leaves the most visible scar. What's so sweet about that?
author: Stephen King

quote: Youre not as sexy as I think you are. She squinted. Wait. That hadnt come out right.
author: Thea Harrison

quote: I don't mind if you forget me.
author: Morrissey

quote: But that was life: Nobody got a guided tour to their own theme park. You had to hop on the rides as they presented themselves, never knowing whether you would like the one you were in line for...or if the bastard was going to make you throw up your corn dog and your cotton candy all over the place.
author: J.R. Ward

quote: Most of the upper management of I.S. were undead. I always thought it was because the job was easier if you didn't have a soul.
author: Kim Harrison

quote: Hell's bells, irony blows.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: I'd rather be fried alive and eaten by Mexicans.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: Do you sleep naked?
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quote: How can such scary looking parents create something so cute?
author: Chetan Bhagat

quote: I love the Olympics, because they enable people from all over the world to come together and--regardless of their political or cultural differences--accuse each other of cheating.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Unusual financial activity: none, unless you count the fact that someone in the family is way too into Civil War biographies. (Can this be a possible indication of Confederate insurgents still living and working in Virginia? Must research further.)
author: Ally Carter

quote: Zoo-Wee Mama!
author: Jeff Kinney

quote: That's chess! snapped Ron. You've got to make some sacrifices!
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: By the way, when you finish the bottle of Crown Royal, you can still use the pouch to hold your broken dreams.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: Good-humor is a philosophic state of mind; it seems to say to Nature that we take her no more seriously than she takes us. I maintain that one should always talk of philosophy with a smile.
author: William James

quote: You told me I was the best sex you'd ever had in your life...You couldn't get enough...At one point you were so loud I thought sure hotel security was going to beat down the door.
author: Rachel Gibson

quote: I like pancakes.
author: Brandon Mull

quote: If we would learn what the human race really is at bottom, we need only observe it in election times.
author: Mark Twain

quote: He moved to sniff some white-and-yellow flowers.
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: You are putting yourself in serious danger...'
author: Marjane Satrapi

quote: Why couldn't you turn into a fireball when we were on the same team!
author: Pittacus Lore

quote: Women are sneaky.
author: Patricia Briggs

quote: Sir Beldevere: What makes you think she's a witch?
author: Graham Chapman

quote: Well, thanks for not shooting anyone, I guess, said Marcus. My contribution was to somehow refrain from peeing myself. You can thank me later.
author: Dan Wells

quote: Who cares even if I didn't?! Conor shouted back. They're just stupid berries. Woo-hoo,
author: Patrick Ness

quote: I'd give my right arm to be ambidextrous.
author: Yogi Berra

quote: At a certain age almost all the questions a person asks him or herself are really just about one thing: how should you live your life?
author: Fredrik Backman

quote: The kiss originated when the first male reptile licked the first female reptile, implying in a subtle way that she was as succulent as the small reptile he had for dinner the night before.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: A guy walks up to me and asks, What's Punk?. So I kick over a garbage can and say. That's punk!. So he kicks over the garbage can and says, That's Punk?, and I say, No that's trendy!
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: I had a dream about you last night... you were a giant slinky and I watched you fall down the stairs.
author: Amy Summers

quote: There must be a mistake, I said.
author: Chelsea M. Cameron

quote: Ambulances were cool. You just want to fondle my extraneous body parts, I said to the EMT as I picked up a silver gadget that looked disturbingly like an alien orifice probe, broke it, then promptly put it back, hoping it wouldnt leave someones life hanging in the balance because the EMT couldnt alien-probe his orifices.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Who knew? I had no idea that someone could be such a thorn in your foot during a death march and still be irresistibly attractive in some magical, undeniable way.
author: Susan Ee

quote: You don't happen to have a thousand dollars I can borrow?
author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quote: BE QUIET!!...What do you want...? I was in the middle of saying something nice...
author: Tite Kubo

quote: Personally, I like it much better when someone else does the decision making. That way you have legitimate grounds to whine and complain. I tend to find both whining and complaining quite interesting and amusing, though sometimes--unfortunately--it's hard to choose which one of the two I want to do.
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: How can I believe in God when just last week I got my tongue caught in the roller of an electric typewriter?
author: Woody Allen

quote: Tut, Tut, looks like rain
author: A.A. Milne

quote: I've tried to get the angel to watch MTV so I can learn the vocabulary of your music, but even with the gift of tongues, I'm having trouble learning to speak hip-hop. Why is it that one can busta rhyme or busta move anywhere but you must busta cap in someone's ass? Is ho always feminine, and muthafucka always masculine, while bitch can be either? How many peeps in a posse, how much booty before baby got back, do you have to be all that to get all up in that, and do I need to be dope and phat to be da bomb or can I just be stupid? I'll not be singing over any dead mothers until I understand.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Do you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?
author: Jean Kerr

quote: I see you're a man with ideals. I better be going before you've still got them.
author: Mae West

quote: Maybe we should go on lots of double dates, Cath said, and then we can get married on the same day in a double ceremony, in matching dresses, and the four of us will light the unity candle all at the same time.
author: Rainbow Rowell

quote: A lot of people ask me if I were shipwrecked, and could have only one book, what would it be? I always say, How to Build a Boat.
author: Stephen Wright

quote: What a strange family you are! Is your name Lettie too?
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: You weren't afraid of me when I was Wolf, he said. Why are you afraid of Nathan?
author: Anne Bishop

quote: Don't be stupid, it's a flying house!
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: He was a writer and words were his weapons.
author: Christopher Moore

quote: Mr. McGregor's a nasty piece of work, isn't he? Quite the Darth Vader of children's literature.
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: It was beautiful in a harsh I'm-going-to-gut-you-like-a-fish kind of way.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: The problem with the designated driver program, it's not a desirable job, but if you ever get sucked into doing it, have fun with it. At the end of the night, drop them off at the wrong house.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Madame Bellwings, Memoir Elf Coordinator, was not at all pleased with this request, because elves who write the memoirs of teenage girls have the habit of returning to the magical realm with atrocious grammar. They can't seem to shake the phrases watever and no way, and they insert the word like into so many sentences that the other elves start slapping them...and for no apparent reason occasionally call out the name Edward Cullen.
author: Janette Rallison

quote: Don't explain computers to laymen. Simpler to explain sex to a virgin.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: I'm not senile, I snapped. If I burn the house down it will be on purpose.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Heifer.
author: Shelly Laurenston

quote: Anthony looked down at his evil clutches -- hands, he reminded himself, hands -- and grinned anew.
author: Julia Quinn

quote: Whenever I get that sad, depressed feeling, I go out and kill a policeman.
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote: Etiquette tip: If you're looking for the right time to leave a party, when the host yells, No one leaves here alive, that's your cue.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Do you always ask me the same questions you ask him?
author: Anne Bishop

quote: Let him treat you like a lady and open the car door for you. If he doesn't automatically open the door for you, stand by the darn thing and don't get into the vehicle until he realises he needs to get hid behind out of the driver's seat and come round and open the car door for you. That's his job!
author: Steve Harvey

quote: Who shall I shoot? You choose. Now, listen very carefully: where's your coffee? You've got coffee, haven't you? C'mon, everyone's got coffee! Spill the beans!
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: He started to touch the mechanism under the keyboard,
author: Rachel Caine

quote: I was never really certain why he scared the bejesus out of me. Nothing scared me growing up. Ive been playing with dead people since the day I was born, so its good thing, yet the Big Bad scared me. Which brings me to the reason I called.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: The lampshade on my head is for my bright ideas. I won't be able to convey them until Monday, when my curtain gets out of the dry cleaners.
author: Bauvard

quote: Men are all the same, they think that because they came out of the belly of a woman they know all there is to know about women.
author: José Saramago

quote: I think it's the duty of the comedian to find out where the line is drawn and cross it deliberately.
author: George Carlin

quote: I swear that woman had a previous career as a death-hunter selling tragic ballads down around the Seven Dials, said Will. And I do wish she wouldn't sing about poisoning just after we've eaten.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: There are women named Faith, Hope, Joy, and Prudence. Why not Despair, Guilt, Rage, and Grief? It seems only right. 'Tom, I'd like you to meet the girl of my dreams, Tragedy.' These days, Trajedi.
author: George Carlin

quote: She blew out a breath between gritted teeth. Sometimes I really want toa frustrated soundbite you!
author: Nalini Singh

quote: My
author: Gail Carriger

quote: If I feel the urge to burst into flames, I'll let you know, Simon was getting fed up. Look, did you actually ask me to come all the way uptown just so you could stare at me like I'm something in a petrie dish? Next time I'll send you a photo.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: You're such a cynic, Molly said.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: I hate patience. Slows everything down.
author: J.D. Robb

quote: Wizard Howl, said Wizard Suliman. I must apologize for trying to bite you so often. In the normal way, I wouldn't dream of setting teeth in a fellow countryman.
author: Diana Wynne Jones

quote: Excuse me? Tonight you represent every dateless woman in this city, every woman who's about to sit down to a lonely meal of Weight Watchers past primavera she's just nuked in the microwave. Every woman who will get into bed tonight with a book or reruns of Sex and the City as her only companion. You are our shining hope....But no pressure.
author: Nora Roberts

quote: Walking around nude in front of humans was not a good way to keep a low profile with the community. It was an excellent way to make new friends, though.
author: Rachel Vincent

quote: This was supposed to be yesterday. I was sitting on the Cardiff/London train, supposedly about to write this very column, and realising something quite terrible. My head was entirely empty. A vast echoing void. Bigger on the inside, but with nothing in it. You could drop a pebble in my brain and wait for an hour to hear it land. No actually, you couldn't - that would be aggressive and unhelpful, so keep your damn pebbles to yourself.
author: Steven Moffat

quote: However, because they have no actual interests of their own (or if they do, they squelch them in order to fit in) and merely pursue those that they think will look best on their college apps, they're zombies.
author: Meg Cabot

quote: If I owned Texas and Hell, I would rent out Texas and live in Hell
author: General Philip Henry Sheridan

quote: Man was made at the end of the week's work when God was tired.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Could you just call me Pigeon? he asked the teacher when she read his name.
author: Brandon Mull

quote: You called me at four thirty-four....I hate four thirty-four. I think four thirty-four should be banned and replaced with something more reasonable, like, say, nine twelve.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: When did you become a woman?-Hatori
author: Natsuki Takaya

quote: Eating rice cakes is like chewing on a foam coffee cup, only less filling.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Easy. Peasy
author: P.C. Cast

quote: Everything has its drawbacks, as the man said when his mother-in-law died, and they came down upon him for the funeral expenses.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: You can't save everyone, though God knows you try.
author: Richelle Mead

quote: What kind of Christmas present would Jesus ask Santa for?
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: How good one feels when one is full -- how satisfied with ourselves and with the world! People who have tried it, tell me that a clear conscience makes you very happy and contented; but a full stomach does the business quite as well, and is cheaper, and more easily obtained.
author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: I've got a black-belt in crazy, and I know where you live.
author: Marjorie M. Liu

quote: Statement: A girl and a boy jump into a river. The boy swims over to the girl and says, God, it's cold.
author: Jenny Downham

quote: On the whole, we're a murderous race. According to Genesis, it took as few as four people to make the planet too crowded to stand, and the first murder was a fratricide. Genesis says that in a fit of jealous rage, the very first child born to mortal parents, Cain, snapped and popped the first metaphorical cap in another human being. The attack was a bloody, brutal, violent, reprehensible killing. Cain's brother Abel probably never saw it coming. As I opened the door to my apartment, I was filled with a sense of empathic sympathy and intuitive understanding. For freaking Cain.
author: Jim Butcher

quote: Are there weapons in a bookstore?'
author: Anne Bishop

quote: Writing is like talking to yourself, just in a way that makes it look like you're not crazy!
author: Mary Kate

quote: If possible, try to avoid pushing each other over the edge, as that would cause me extra paperwork.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: No matter how much the cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: And Flock Rule Number Two is, Don't argue with Max or you'll live to regret it. I spun and stomped out to the clearing, turning back for one last jab at Dylan. And by the way, you clearly DON'T know me better than Fang does. Do you see Fang arguing with me? No, you do not.
author: James Patterson

quote: It's not reasonable to love people who are only going to die, she said.
author: Kristin Cashore

quote: Winston Gallagher! I said, recognizing the first ghost I'de met. Then my eyes narrowed & I covered my hand in front of my crotch as I saw Winstons gaze fasten there next. Don't even think about poltergeisting my panties again. This is the sod? Come here you scurvy little-- Bones don't! I interrupted. He stopped, giving a last glare to him while mouthing YOU. ME. EXORCIST. before returning to my side.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: Are You Ready for New Urban Fragrances?
author: Tom Robbins

quote: That's the coolest thing I've ever seen, Puck said.
author: Michael Buckley

quote: Laurel, David? Would you like to share the joke with the rest of the class? he asked, one hand on his skinny hip.
author: Aprilynne Pike

quote: And pictures of perfection, as you know, make me sick and wicked.
author: Jane Austen

quote: I have an inferiority complex, but its not a very good one.
author: Steven Wright

quote: No, said Luis, You can't date the Lord of the Night Court.
author: Holly Black

quote: A lot of people are afraid of heights. Not me, I'm afraid of widths.
author: Steven Wright

quote: Holy mother of rectangles.
author: Dan Howell

quote: Written on her tombstone: I told you I was sick.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: If a mute kid swears, should his mother wash his hands with soap?
author: Steven Wright

quote: She's under duress, Peaseblossom said.
author: Lisa Mantchev

quote: Beside me, Molly rolled her shoulders in a few jerky motions and pushed at her hair in fitful little gestures. She tugged at her well-tattered skirts, and grimaced at her boots. Can you see if theres any mud on them?
author: Jim Butcher

quote: You're not eating anything, said Marilla sharply, eying her as if it were a serious shortcoming. Anne sighed.
author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quote: There are some dogs which, when you meet them, remind you that, despite thousands of years of man-made evolution, every dog is still only two meals away from being a wolf. These dogs advance deliberately, purposefully, the wilderness made flesh, their teeth yellow, their breath a-stink, while in the distance their owners witter, He's an old soppy really, just poke him if he's a nuisance, and in the green of their eyes the red campfires of the Pleistocene gleam and flicker.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Tyrion let the eunuch help him mount. Lord Varys, he said from the saddle, sometimes I feel as though you are the best friend I have in King's Landing and sometimes I feel you are my worst enemy.
author: George R.R. Martin

quote: Not entirely fair? His voice became that of the inferno: a rushing, booming howl of icy evil that flew around the great cavern, as swift and cold as the Wendigo on skates. I am Satan, also called Lucifer the Light Bearer...
author: Jonathan L. Howard

quote: Specifically, Id like to debate whether cannibalism ought to be grounds for leniency in murders, since its less wasteful.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Is this the girl? Kierans voice was very different: It sounded like waves sliding up the shore. Like warm water under pale light. It was seductive, with an edge of cold. (rofl! what? are you really rolling on the floor laughing? well, please stay down there a sec while i KICK YOUR ASS)

quote: Why, arent you just about as sweet as syrup on a sundae? I sure would appreciate that, maam. He winked. Howd you like ta stroll the deck of this fine ship with me and watch the sunset? Why, I think youre a pullin my leg there, Texas. Youve had your sea legs a lot longer than I have. He rubbed the stubble on his face. You might be right at that. Well then, how about you taggin along to keep me warm? Its about eighty degrees. Shoot, youre a smart one, you are. Then how bout I jes say that a feller can get pretty lonesome by hisself in a strange country and hed like to keep compny with you fer a while longer.

quote: It is often argued that religion is valuable because it makes men good, but even if this were true it would not be a proof that religion is true. That would be an extension of pragmatism beyond endurance. Santa Claus makes children good in precisely the same way, and yet no one would argue seriously that the fact proves his existence. The defense of religion is full of such logical imbecilities. The theologians, taking one with another, are adept logicians, but every now and then they have to resort to sophistries so obvious that their whole case takes on an air of the ridiculous. Even the most logical religion starts out with patently false assumptions. It is often argued in support of this or that one that men are so devoted to it that they are willing to die for it. That, of course, is as silly as the Santa Claus proof. Other men are just as devoted to manifestly false religions, and just as willing to die for them. Every theologian spends a large part of his time and energy trying to prove that religions for which multitudes of honest men have fought and died are false, wicked, and against God.
author: H.L. Mencken

quote: Yes you're getting your tattoo. I threw my arms around Dad's neck. Thank you! Hey, Mom said. I'm the one who had to persuade him it wasn't turning his little girl into a streetwalker. author: John Green

quote: Sorry, did I say something wrong? said Marvin, dragging himself on regardless. Pardon me for breathing, which I never do anyway so I don't know why I bother to say it, oh God I'm so depressed. Here's another one of those self-satisfied doors.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: You can't make footprints in the sands of time if you're sitting on your butt. And who wants to make buttprints in the sands of time?
author: Bob Moawad

quote: We only came close to dying six or seven times, which I thought was pretty good. Once, I lost my grip and found myself dangling by one hand from a ledge fifty feet above the rocky surf. But I found another handhold and kept climbing. A minute later Annabeth hit a slippery patch of moss and her foot slipped. Fortunately, she found something else to put it against. Unfortunately, that something was mt face.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: Be you wise and never sad,
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: The lustful glances thrown his way made me wish he wasnt such a damned bowl of eye candy.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: He gave her a sly, sideways look. Did you
author: Julia Quinn

quote: And by golly, love sure was a battlefield. Benatar was right about that.
author: Charlaine Harris

quote: How did you kill the Ashman in the forest last year?
author: Chelsea Fine

quote: In my mind, I'm probably the biggest sex maniac you ever saw.
author: J.D. Salinger

quote: Well finish your story anyway.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: The only way to behave to a woman is to make love to her if she is pretty, and to someone else if she is plain.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Not daring to flee since my general location has just been broadcast to any killer who cares. I mean, I know it's cold out here and not everybody has a sleeping bag.
author: Suzanne Collins

quote: Sorry, she said. I have a psychological disorder that prevents me from keeping thoughts inside my head where they belong.
author: Jeri Smith-Ready

quote: And Mega has a crush on Chester.
author: Karen Marie Moning

quote: Rich children are always blond, Jocelyn goes. It has to do with vitamins.
author: Jennifer Egan

quote: What's the point of being a grown-up if you don't get to be immature?
author: Steven Moffat

quote: The internet is just a world passing notes around a classroom.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: Now lemme get this straight, she said in a throaty, nasal voice. You put the lime in the cocanut and drink 'em both up--whoa, long faces. What am I interrupting?
author: Lauren Kate

quote: I'll take the cemetery, Kane said. He didn't sound excited. Rather, he sounded resigned. The club might collapse if I go.
author: Gena Showalter

quote: And...I think that's what life is all about, actually,
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Bethany blinked. Did you just hit me? she asked, disbelief coloring her every feature.
author: Jennifer Lynn Barnes

quote: Conner Lassiter. Scheduled to be unwound the 21st of November-until you went AWOL. You caused an accident that killed a bus driver, left dozens of others injured, and shut down an interstate highway for hours. Then, on top of it, you took a hostage AND shot a Juvey-cop with his own tranq gun.
author: Neal Shusterman

quote: The only reason there's such a thing as a morning in the first place is to keep night and afternoon from bumping into each other.
author: David Eddings

quote: Opinions are like onions. They spell similarly, usually have many layers, and tend to make people cry.
author: Caitlyn Paige

quote: Roger, he has a chain saw, I hissed. I am not going to die in Kentucky!
author: Morgan Matson

quote: Juliet's version of cleanliness was next to godliness, which was to say it was erratic, past all understanding and was seldom seen.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Your mum pounced on her and started sucking away. Wouldve been arousing if not for all the screaming.
author: Jeaniene Frost

quote: See, you think I give a shit. Wrong. In fact, while you talk, I'm thinking; How can I give less of shit? That's why I look interested.
author: Justin Halpern

quote: Genius is of small use to a woman who does not know how to do her hair.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: And if you say that's because you lot barged into her home like a herd of mentally deficient sheep, I'm disowning all three of you.
author: Julia Quinn

quote: But I was not in the band, because I suffer from the kind of tone deafness that is generally associated with actual deafness
author: John Green

quote: There is no question that there is an unseen world. The problem is, how far is it from midtown and how late is it open?
author: Woody Allen

quote: Whats next? The size of my cock?
author: J.R. Ward

quote: Not really hungry.
author: Karen Chance

quote: Hash, x. There is no definition for this word - nobody knows what hash is.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: My powers of persuasion are only as strong as the bullshit I have to back it up.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: I am too tired, I must try to rest and sleep, otherwise I am lost in every respect. What an effort to keep alive! Erecting a monument does not require an expenditure of so much strength.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Whenever I think of something but can't think of what it was I was thinking of, I can't stop thinking until I think I'm thinking of it again. I think I think too much.
author: Criss Jami

quote: Oh shit, the mummy's after us, let's all walk a little faster
author: Stephen King

quote: Death doesn't care about personalities - he's more interested in meeting quotas.
author: Jasper Fforde

quote: I've missed you, Sebastian.
author: Lisa Kleypas

quote: All art is but dirtying the paper delicately.
author: John Ruskin

quote: In a moment of sheer terror, I realized I couldn't feel my brain. It was there just a minute ago. Maybe I really was dead. Do I look dead to you?
author: Darynda Jones

quote: God I loved Sammy. Id considered marrying him, but his wife got upset when I asked for his hand.
author: Darynda Jones

quote: Of all the consumer products, chewing gum is perhaps the most ridiculous: it literally has no nourishment  you just chew it to give yourself something to do with your stupid idiot Western mouth.
author: Russell Brand

quote: He awoke at six, as usual. He needed no alarm clock. He was already comprehensively alarmed.
author: Martin Amis

quote: Hobbies of any kind are boring except to people who have the same hobby. This is also true of religion, although you will not find me saying so in print.
author: Dave Barry

quote: Why are there five syllables in the word monosyllabic?
author: Steven Wright

quote: No one messes around with a nerds computer and escapes unscathed.
author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quote: Come to think of it, she did not speak a word. Yet I could have sworn she had the most beautiful voice.
author: Julie Klassen

quote: Yeah, I get it; you're a vampire, she said. Creepy. And okay, a little hot, I admit.
author: Rachel Caine

quote: Whew! You two are blowing hotter air than a tornado circlin a volcano in Hades.
author: Colleen Houck

quote: Don't you see Blaynie. Mitch put his arm around her shoulders. You're like an illegitimate little sister that I never wanted.
author: Shelly Laurenston
